title: Does the job
review: We've just got back from our stay at this hotel. It was our first holiday with our 10month old and we were extremely excited. Prior to arrival id tried contacting the hotel to enquire about a cot for our little one but had no replies. Upon arrival the member of staff on reception charged us the tourist tax (which we were fully aware of) but then charged us 60euros for the hire of a cot for 10 nights. I expressed my annoyance at the time but had no choice but to pay it. (I'm still very unhappy about this as most other hotels offer this service free of charge). The cot was absolutely filthy and looked like it was years old.  Putting that aside the room itself was extremely clean and had everything we needed for our stay. There was regular cleaning and the cleaners were absolutely lovely ladies !!!!  There were lifts from the room and ramps down to the reception area but then steps from there down to the pool which posed an issue for us with our pushchair meaning we had to go all the way around the outside of the hotel to get there when we took the pushchair.  The entertainment at night was average and didn't start until gone 9 each night (which we were already aware of) we found the pool bar quite expensive so didn't use it much. The location of the hotel was great and very close to all amenities. Lots of places were closing though mid October so just be aware of that if you're planning on travelling then.  Overall the hotel was ok and did what we needed but we're still quite cross at the charges for the cot and the lack of access.…

title: Another awesome holiday
review: After visiting Cala D’or last year, my uncle and I returned this time for a week the apartment was clean tidy tour beds and towels changed for you the staff were helpful and I have already booked for 2020 this time the whole family are coming to visit this amazing place

title: Regular Visitor
review: Dear Danny A, Thank you to spend your time to write a review about us. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. See you next October :) Best regards, Ola es Ravells team

title: Catherine duffy
review: If you are planning a trip to Cala D'Or be very careful about the location of your stay. Although the main part is quite small, the resort stretches bajk quite a distance and some locations are quite remote. These apartments are excellently located within a 5 minute walk of all amenities. I have now returned to these apartments for the last 5 years and know exactly what to expect. The receptionist staff are most welcoming, helpful and friendly and I make particular reference to the experienced guy (not sure of his name) who has been there each year I have stayed there and always goes the extra mile to ensure you have a good and stress free holiday. Rooms are not large but are what you would expect from the price. They are cleaned regularly. The outdoor bar is a great place to relax and the staff are particularly friendly and the place is well managed by the big fella in charge. Great variety of modern musical entertainment each night (albeit the Abba act could now do with an update). Would highly recommend and will no doubt return next year.…

title: Good location
review: Dear kevinjohnson592 , Thank you to spend your time to write a review about us.Always it's a pleasure to see you here with us. We wish you a nice winter and we hope to see you again next summer. Our best, Ola es Ravells Team

title: First time to Cala D'Or
review: I was very pleased with the location as had not visited before.The apartment was good value for money. It was clean,tidy,light and airy and the balcony overlooked a park. There was a great Italian restaurant only half a minute away which was very reasonably priced for food and drinks. The local beach, Cala Gran, was literally 3 minutes walk away and did not dissapoint. The town is around 4 mins walk away and had too many great looking restaurants to choose from along with many shops. The bus stop is located just before the beach. One thing I would definitely recommended to do is to arrange transfers to and from the apartments as the taxi fare is €75 each way. We arranged a transfer from the apartments to the airport- was €29 for both of us and took around 1.5 hours- was a nice…

title: Fantastic
review: Dear  Jo R Thank you to spend your time to write a review about us. We are glad that you enjoyed your holidays with us. We hope to see you next summer. Best regards, Ola es Ravells Team

title: Great time
review: We are currently five days into a seven day holiday, we read some reviews about people saying it was noisy, so we asked for a room far away from the nightly shows, it is perfect for us, the apartment is huge and spotlessly clean, we can not fault it at all, the fridge is great for keeping the beers cold. The staff are brilliant, really friendly and helpful, we had one small minor problem which was quickly sorted, not sure what the entertainment was like as we never went to see it, we just went to the local bars, I would highly recommend this place and wouldn't hesitate to go back.

title: Noisy,noisy,noisy!
review: Dear  chessfun, Thank you to spend your time to write a review about our apartments. We are glad that you enjoyed your holidays with us and we hope to see you again in the near future. We wish you a nice winter. Our best, Ola es Ravells Team

title: Poor Entertaintment
review: We had a great time in our 3rd floor (with a lift) apartment - staff were very helpful/polite and efficient - entertainment in the tropical garden was excellent - just one hiccup, as pensioners we felt that some sort of grab rail in the shower would really help all the old buggers and reduce the risk of 'having a fall' - we will be back!!!

title: Exceeds expectations ...
review: Stayed here towards the end of August ... excellent location, Customer service and accommodation that combined to make it a great holiday !   Can heartily recommend Cala d’or as a destination and the Ravells apartments are a really base for exploring the area.

title: Es Ravells
review: Dear Adventurer320303, Thank you to spend your time to write a review about us. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to see you again in the near future. We wish you a lovely winter. Our best, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Super convenient and yet quiet
review: Been coming back here for years, great place to stay, fantastic staff and really close to the town centre. Rooms are clean and tidy and towels and bedding changed regularly. Tropical gardens offer entertainment in the evening.

title: Very good apartment.
review: Dear Steve B, Thank you to take your time to write a review about us. We are glad that you enjoyed your satay with us and we hope to see you again next summer. Have a nice winter. Best regards, Ola es Ravells Team

title: First Time
review: Currently staying here for two weeks. We are in block 5 ground floor which is very quiet indeed. Exactly what we asked for. Lots of supermarkets around and a 10 minute or less walk into the centre where all the action is, and dozens of restaurants  and bars. Live music abounds! The apartment is immaculate and well enough equipped for most.  Always plenty of hot water and a great shower. Big balcony and view over trees.  By the pool there is live music each night and a good bar, although we tend to walk into town.

title: Some good and some bad
review: Have stayed many times in these apartments and the staff are always pleased to see us and always eager to help with any problems.  The rooms are adequate if a little basic but contain kettle, toaster and microwave. The aircon worked ok and could cool the room quite well. Not sure what the position is regarding the pool.  Does it belong to the hotel or as it seemed to be privately owned.  The owner put a notice up saying that no food/drinks etc to be consumed at the pool except those brought at the bar or people would be asked to leave.  We saw one person being asked to leave in a very nasty way after eating there own food which begs the answer to my question above.  If it does not belong to the hotel then this should be stated on there web site so people staying there would…

title: Perfect!
review: Dear sukeNotts, Thank you to spend your time to write a review about our hotel. This review help us to keep improving our service. We wish you  a lovely winter. Our Best, Ola es Ravells Team

title: Some Positives and some negatives.
review: We checked in on the 15/8 for 8 nights a family of 3, 2 adults and one child, we arrived at around 22.30, check in was simple and took no longer than 5 mins, receptionist very friendly and helpful, directed us to our room which was block 6 6201, on entering our room we were pleasantly surprised, it was all clean and spacious, the balcony was massive, and larger than the whole apartment! Had a perfect view of the pool and entertainment stage so could watch on the balcony!Free air con is great, and the room is well equipped for a self catering holiday, we didn’t do much cooking in the room but the facilities were adequate with hob, toaster, kettle, microwave and utensils etc. The maids came every other day and where friendly and efficient. The pool is fab but there really aren’t…

title: Perfect
review: Dear ff82 Thank's a lot to spend your time to write a review about our apartments. We are glad that you enjoyed your holidays with us and we hope to see you again in the near future. We wish you a nice winter. Greetings from the sunny Cala d'Or, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Summer Holidays
review: Firstly, staff very helpful, especially receptions Jose. Had a apartment that spent four, two in a twin bedroom and two on a convertible sofa bed [not fold out]. Apartment had balcony, was modern, equipped well enough, clean and comfortable with a shower over a bath and plenty of hot water.  Nice, reasonable size swimming pool that anyone can have access to, and do! Lifeguard sits on the stage [built for the nightly entertainment and probably for the shade] but is not keeping an eye on things as he needs a proper shaded and elevated veiwing point made for him in the correct position. While there there was a group of five teenagers, along with their mother, that spent 'hours' grappling and throwing each other in the pool, with no consideration for anyone else of 'any' age, and…

title: Lovely Apartment
review: Lovely modern clean apartment, quite a small balcony for a family. The pool actually belongs to Tropical Garden not the apartment complex, so the pool is open to the public but we could always get a sunbed from 9am (no rushing to get a bed) lovely staff at the Tropical Garden and also the apartments. Good entertainment at night & was great to be able to watch it from our balcony. Shops and restaurants right beside us and the beach and centre is just a short walk.

title: Ok but a few niggles
review: Dear twins20142017 Thanks a lot to spend your time to write a review about us. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. Have a nice rest of the summer. Greetings from the sunny Cala d'Or, Ola es Ravells Team

title: Too noisy!
review: Location is very good and close to the beach. Our apartment was clean but on the small side, there were 2 of us so it was ok but would definitely struggle with a family of 4 (bathroom was tiny). Pool is nice but some days we could not get a sun bed as the hotel does let non residents use the area. My main complaint is the noise from the bar next door which goes on until 2.30am, the music is played at an incredibly loud volume, my daughter was in tears some nights as she couldn’t sleep (guests with children should not be allocated this section), the room was shaking from the music. Also our balcony had an extractor fan directly outside which made it too noisy to sit out. So all in all this wasn’t the peaceful break I was looking for...

title: Lyndsey Stobbs
review: Dear JoLeeds21, Thank you to take your time to write a review about us, this is very important for us to keep improving our services. Have a nice rest of the summer and a lovely winter. Our best, Ola es Ravells Team

title: Great apartment and great location
review: It’s a shame to have to write this but the hotel is horrifically noisy. If you want to be asleep before 2am don’t stay here. We are in room 7001 and have The ‘Hollywood’ bar underneath and every night there is singing and karaoke. It is so loud it feels as though Elvis is standing at the end of the bed!! Certainly not the relaxing evening which you’d expect from a holiday.  Aside from this, (if you can get over this!) the apartments have been great. The location is spot on. 2 min walk to beach. Lots of great restaurants close by. The pool is nice too with great entertainment for the kids. I’d love to stay here again so it’s a shame but the noise is too much!

title: Great place great location
review: we have stayed at Es Ravells  a few times in May every time. We have a 1 bed apartment & have always been in blocks 6 & 7. We love these lots of room for 2 well equipped, clean & comfortable. In these blocks there is a great view over the tropical gardens so you can see the pool & in the evening the entertainment if you do not want to pay for it. If you dont like it then this could be a down side. Regarding noise qwe have never had a problem but it may be a different story in high season. from other reviews i think you  may be unlucky with some rooms in some blocks but I can't say anything negative

title: Good hotel fantastic entertainment
review: Dear nigel691 Thank's a lot to spend your time to write a review about us. We are glad that you spend a nice time with us. We hope to see you again next summer. Best regards, Ola es Ravells Team

title: Place of peace
review: I have just spent a week at Es Ravells with my extended family including my five year old and two year old sons. The hotel is clean and in a very good location, near to fantastic beaches and within a few minutes walk of the main square of bars and restaurants.   We never ate at the tropical garden but did buy a lot of drink from there, the drinks and ice creams are reasonably priced and there are deals on bottles of San Miguel etc 2 for €5  The hotel is good but what made our holiday was the entertainment, both of our sons have came back having made a new best friend in Mark. He goes out of his way to make sure kids are having fun and his mini Disco is hilarious. The holiday would not have been the same without him and he was a good laugh with all of the grown ups too, we will…

title: Entertainment staff
review: Dear SamAth1, Thank you to take your time to write a review about us. We are glad taht you enjoyed the stay with us, we will pass the review to Mark. Have nice rest of the summer and we hope to see you again in the near future. Greetings from the sunny Cala d'Or, Ola es Ravells Team

title: lovely holiday
review: We stayed here 5 days in May with our baby (15 months old). The flat is very comfort for everything and located in a quiet area of Cala d’Or near 400 mt to the centre (restaurant and shops) and the beautiful beach. The staff were kind and helpful.

title: Good hotel
review: Had a lovely stay at this hotel.rooms fresh and clean.bathroom was a bit on the small side but had a fabulous shower.staff really helpful. Close to beach, shops and restaurants. Mark the entertainment guy was a friendly soul...loved his dance routine ! Nightly enertainers were also good.enjoyed my stay had a great time.

title: Es Revells hotel
review: Dear Miranda,   On behalf of the Ravells d'Or team we thank you so much for such a detailed review. It is a pleasure for us to see that we did our work well and you could enjoy that much. It would be a pleasure for us to see you next year again.  Yours faithfully,  Es Ravells Team.

title: Lovely place
review: Great location plenty shops bars near by and the beach is a short stroll away. Staff are very friendly and can't do enough for you. The entertainment guy Mark kept us all entertained throughout are stay. Would definitely recommend the hotel and are already going to book up again for next year.

title: Fab location lovely apartments
review: Dear Garry,  We appreciate such words about us. There is nothing that can make us happier than satisfying our guests needs and make their stay simply unforgetable. Thank you again for that review and see you next year!!  Best regards,  Es Ravells d'Or team.

title: Holiday 2019
review: Clean tidy apartment everyone so friendly entertainment is Brilliant thanks to mark keep the good work up location spot on will return next year  well done to all the staff and cleaners Sharon and garry

title: Small Room
review: Booked a 1 bedroomed apartment, great location, but room very very small, no storage space, just one very small wardrobe, no shelves, no dressing table, kitchen facilities very basic no room even to drain pots, bathroom was extremely small just enough room to get in, difficult to get into shower which was over the bath, not a very big opening and shower screen didn't open, lounge only had a table and a small uncomfortable sofa - no way cud 4 people fit in this apartment we were just 2 and found it very claustrophobic, luckily we had a large balcony and the weather was fine so spent most of our time on there - description on the website was very misleading although very clean when we arrived just got a change of towels and sheets but no cleaning done not a huge problem as the…

title: Decent and clean
review: Nice spacious apartments close to all of the amenities of cala d'or and the beach is just a few mins stroll away. Other beaches within a 10 min stroll .   The apartment we had was a studio on the ground floor so not a great view of anything much but we were mostly out anyway. Spotless bathroom and shower. Clean towels and beds made daily. Housekeeping staff were nice and friendly. Reception staff were very professional and helpful.      The pool actually belongs to the Tropical Gardens restaurant so is only open 9am - 6pm when the lifeguard is on duty. I felt it could be swept a bit more around there as there was often bits of leaves and other natural debris on the steps down to the sun terrace and pool.  The pool bar does food but its twice as expensive as the bar just outside…

title: Nice place
review: Our self catering apartment in block 5 was, lovely, with good sized rooms and comfy beds. The air conditioning could have been better mind. Good entertainment at night having different tribute acts on. Some better than others but all added to a fantastic holiday.

title: Great wee place
review: Just back from a great week in lovely Cala Dor. The apartments are lovely and modern and most importantly clean. The reception staff were all great and couldnt do enough for us. As mentioned in previous reviews the pool is shared but this wasn't a problem for us as it was relatively quiet while we stayed. Great value for money and wouldn't hesitate on recommending these apartments. They are also in a really central spot close to supermarkets, restaurants and the gorgeous beaches.

title: Apartment great. Entertainment, errr
review: Dear rachaelhunter32 Thank you to spend your time to write a review about us. We are happy that you enjoy your holidays with us and we hope to see you again next summer. Best regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Clean basic apartments
review: The receptionist was pleasant and friendly and gave us a warm welcome on arrival. The room was clean. Decor was fine. uPVC doors and windows meant you could be sure no large insects could get in at night. It was nice to be able to watch the show from the balcony when we came back early from the main town, although the shows weren't up to much. It was ok though. The location of this hotel is very central, ideal for shops, bars and restaurants, of which there are plenty in Cala d'Or. The pool area and grounds (which constitute the view from the balconies) are really beautiful and well kept. This makes sitting on the balcony very pleasant. Balconies get the sun for most of the day.  There were a few small problems, such as the kettle lid was broken. The apartment was clean but…

title: Ola Apartment
review: Dear Ann N Thank you to take your time to write a review about us. This review help us to continue improving our service, also we are glad that you enjoy your holidays with us and we hope to see you again in the near future. Best regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Good decent hotel
review: When arrived at hotel was placed in room 7101 which unfortunately was directly above the bar Hollywood with Karaoke going on till 2am which was not a real problem as we weren’t going to bed much earlier but at 6am the staff started getting the bar ready for the day dragging furniture and banging about we asked for a move the next day but had to wait 2 days due to hotel being full. But once moved everything was fine, rooms are clean and well equipped. The pool area although open to non residents was clean tidy and staff at bar were very friendly and attentive. Although can imagine getting very busy in high season. Apart from initial room problems hotel was very good, centrally locates and would return.

title: Late september holiday
review: Dear Safari284016 Thank you to spend your time to write a review about us. Sorry for the inconveniences at the time of your arrival. We are glad that you enjoy your holidays with us and we hope to see you again in the near future. Have a nice winter, Best regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Perfect.
review: The apartment was clean and tidy and exactly what I thought it would be. Kitchen was slightly too small for an apartment and cooking a full meal would be difficult. But for breakfast and dinner it was perfectly fine. We visited out of season so the hotel was quiet. If you come in summer the pool area may be a bit too small for all of the guests. The reception staff were friendly. It’s in a good location with restaurants and bars down the street. It’s a few minutes walk from the beach. Evening entertainment is a bit mixed. Let it Beatles were good and funny. Watched from the balcony. Will be coming again.

title: great appartment central in cala dór
review: very helpfull friendly staff, clean appartment with everything you need. housekeeping everyother day. Great place to stay with children as everything is provided that you may need.  Only downside was that the airco doesn't stay on the whole night but by opening the balcony door it stays cool enough that it doesnt cause any problems we had a room close to the pool which mean that the nighttime entertainment can be heard untill 12. We enjoyed this as we could go out because our son was sleeping but we could still enjoy the show from our balcony. Maybe if you would prefer something quieter you should request a room further away

title: Family Holiday
review: Dear sineadNijmegen, Thank you to spend your time to write an opinion about us. We are glad that you enjoy your holidays with us and we hope to see you in the near future, have a nice summer. Kind regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Ola Es Ravells
review: Recently visted the apartments in September 18 with my family of three. Upon arriving greeted by a lovely gentleman in reception. He kindly told us we had been allocated an apartment above the noisy karaoke bar. He then kindly moved us to two seperate apartments for one night, until they could move us to a family studio once one became available. I thought this was very honest of him. On the whole if you are looking for a reasonable priced holiday I didn't think the apartments and facilities were bad for the money. They are clean the staff are friendly and the area is a good base for the resort. My only criticism of the apartments are that, if they spent more money and put it back into maintaining the grounds and pool area, it could be so much more. The rooms are well equiped…

title: Family Holiday
review: Dear Audra C, Thank you to take your time to write a review about our Apartments. We are glad that you enjoy your holidays with us and we give you the thanks because this review is helping us to continue improving. Have a nice winter.  Best regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Big hotel
review: We as a family come back year on year. The hotel Staff and Manager are so friendly nothing too much trouble.  The hotel is situated in a good place 10 mins from all the Resteraunts. You can catch the Train outside too.

title: Good sized apartment with 2 balconies
review: Stayed here with a friend and we were upgraded to a better apartment. Fab sized rooms, 2 balconies. The sofa beds in the living room seemed damp, maybe they were wiped down but the material never felt comfortable for this reason. The bed was fine though.  The only problem we found was the amount of ants within the rooms.  Location is central, close to a number of beaches and activities nearby too. Not too far from the main restaurant areas.  Lovely pool with manned by a life guard. Our apartment was a bit away from the pool though. It did mean that entertainment wasn't quite as loud this way though.

title: Good location
review: Dear HyperBunny86 Thank you to spend your time to write a review about us. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future.  Greetings from the sunny Cala d'Or, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Burgled
review: We stayed in Cala d'or in 2017 and knew of this hotel and gardens. We travelled with our son and daughter and their familes so there was 12 altogether. We arrived at approx 11pm, hoping to check in quickley and get the little ones off to bed. The first problem was my husband and I were given the wrong room, when we went in it was already occupied. We spoke to the receptionist and her reply to us was "I dont think so" she went and looked. Oh yes it was. Down to reception to get it put right, next problem was there was no cot in sons room for the one year old. My sons partner asked for a cot, to be told that noone was available to get one for her and the baby could sleep on the bed. I said we needed a cot asap, we also needed one for the two year old. I think before we all…

title: Great Location/Great Apartment/Very noisy
review: Dear hilaryc57 Thank you to take your time to write a review about us, this review is good for us to keep improving our service to the custumers. We are very sorry about the problems at the time of your arrival. We hope you give us a second chance. Have a nicest rest of the summer to you and your lovely family, Best regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Great location & excellent room
review: I stayed at this hotel for 4 nights with my husband & 16 month old son. On the first night our hotel room was broken in to & valuables stolen whilst we slept. The hotel staff weren’t helpful all, they questioned weather it actually happened, said it hadn't happened before, which was later found to be a lie when talking to some English people by the pool who worked in a nearby hotel & at one point the hotel receptionist even said it wasn’t her fault. We had to walk to find the police station ourselves as the manager said they wouldn’t come out & he said CCTV isnt allowed. It is such a shame this happened as the hotel is actually nice with clean apartments, a nice pool area & a good poolside bar & entertainment. Cala D’Or it’s self is also a lovely place although a little pricey.

title: Great place to stay!
review: The location of the Ola Apartmentos Es Ravells D'Or is ideal for both Cala D'or and Cala Ferrera. The apartments are set very near the centre of Cala D'or, just a few minutes walk down to the beautiful beach of Cala Gran and the main town area with the shops, bars and restaurants. It is also within about 20 minutes walk to Cala Ferrera beach, and the shops and restaurants there. The marina is slightly further away, about 30 minutes walk, but well worth it. The self catering apartments we stayed in are basic, but clean, modern and airy, and very good value for money. The balcony looks down over the 'tropical garden' bar area, which has live entertainment every evening, which you can watch from the balcony with a beer, or go down to the bar. There is a nice swimming pool with…

title: Lovely Cala D’Or.
review: Dear Mariah5464 Thank's a lot to spend your time to write a review about us. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to se you again next summer. Greetings from the sunny Cala d'Or, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Mixed review.
review: First visit to Cala d’Or and it was beautiful. Hotel was in a great location close to everything and easy to get your bearings from. Rooms are adequate with bathroom on the small side. No privacy on the balcony as only a 4 foot wall between each. Not great that the pool area is owned by bar /restaurant tropical garden therefore anybody using the bar can use the pool. Entertainment on every night from kids disco at 8.30pm to tribute act at 9.30pm-12am. This was quite noisy especially if you weren’t wanting listen to it. Out of 7 nights there were only 2 acts which we thought any good. The ABBA angels and the Beatles tribute (and we aren’t even Beatles fans.) We didn’t go out of our way to watch the nightly shows but couldn’t help it as our balcony overlooked the stage. If you are…

title: Stayed here for 10 days from 14th to 23rd May
review: Dear AdmiralAwesome Thank you to spend your time to write a review about us. We are sorry about the noise at nights due the shows. We hope to see you again in the near future. Have a nice rest of the summer. Kind regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Friendly and helpful staff
review: I stayed in a studio which had 2 single beds placed together with a massive bathroom with bath and shower.studio had a microwave,kettle,pots,pans,cutlery and a fridge.There was ample storage for clothes.The staff were very friendly and the rooms get changed frequently with clean towels and bedsheets. A few bad points is that the pool doesn’t belong to the apartments and you can’t take food down to the pool.That belongs to tropical gardens which has tribute acts on every night from 9.30 till midnight.Also there is no privacy whatsoever on the balcony’s. You need to have good quiet neighbours  cos I experienced a few nights with next to no sleep with the neighbours slamming doors and making a racket on the balcony at 4am to 6am.I would stay here again but quiet neighbours is a…

title: No room first night
review: We arrived at the hotel at 23.30 to be greeted by the receptionist and was told that we had no room we were relocated round the corner at the cala d'or so for on night and they paid for our breakfast. Got to say that after the initial disappointment it was handled well rest of our holiday went great apartment great reception helpful only issue for peak season visitors is the entertainment is open to the public and gets full early

title: For the Family
review: Dear Tony W Thank you to take your time to write a review about us. We are really sorry for the inconveniences at the time of your arrival. At the same time we are really happy to know that you enjoyed your holidays with us and we hope to see you again in the near future. Best regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: A true review
review: Lovely little apartments, compact and clean. We stayed in a studio apartment, 1 room, 1 bath/shower,  the other option is a 2 room (seperate bedroom) with bath/shower, the bathroom is very spacious and hot water is available all day, with complimentary toiletries provided,  everything you would need is provided, fridge, toaster, electric hob, electric kettle, etc etc, tv is provided but sadly with only 2 channels in English and they're both news channels,  but then again we don't go on holiday to look at TV, rooms are fresh and very clean,  and every room gets a balcony overlooking the swimming pool and entertainment stage at Tropical Garden. The apartments are about 400m from one of the small beaches and a few more metres from the busy town centre with lots of restaurents.

title: Nice Hotel, Perfect Location
review: Dear DavidPD59 Thanks a lot to spend your time to write a review about us. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near futere. Greetings from the sunny Cala d'Or, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Love it!
review: We visited cala dor 02.05-06.05  Arrival Arriving at the hotel the bus pulled up and thank God we had some people to as no signs to reception just follow the stairs down wards. Check in seemed a long process and we were put in room 7106.  Room We had booked a 1 bed apartment. After being directed by reception to go back the way we had came to the main road and to go along some dogey looking buildings we managed to find the hidden away elevator to our block. Entering our room we found we had twin beds when we had booked a double (the hotels response to this was to just push them together) The room was very big and clean and we loved the little kitchen and made food use of it. It has everything you need fridge freezer microwave 2 ring stove toaster kettle and sink. Balcony was of…

title: Lovely apartment!
review: Stayed in summer of 2017 with 3 kids for 1 week. The apartment was adequate for 2 adults and 2 kids (the living room couch is not the most comfortable for the adults, but suffices for children). The bathroom had a problem with smell that nobody could figure out where it was coming from. The pool view is a bad idea if you like sleeping before midnight. The music is very loud, and I would suggest the other side. But overall a nice place and friendly stuff.

title: A great little hotel in a fantastic location  ;-)
review: Dear jazzymax Thank you to spend your time to write a review about us this is very important for keep improving. We hope to see you again in the near future. Best Regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Perfect holiday location
review: This hotel is in an excellent location, less than 5 minutes from a beautiful beach and a lively town centre with lots of excellent bars and restaurants.  The staff were friendly and very helpful.  We checked in quickly and the room was spacious for 2 people, clean and had a very sunny balcony, opposite the pool and stage (so if you didn't want to join in, you could happily sit and enjoy the evening entertainment from your balcony).   We had a last minute booking for this hotel and therefore had a very good deal, we were also, literally the last guests to leave at the end of the season, this meant that the bar and evening entertainment were only available on our first night, this didn't bother us but we were happy to arrive back to a fairly lively crowd enjoying the Abba Tribute…

title: Never again
review: Dear Rachael G Thank you to take your time to write a review about us. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to see you again next summer. Kind regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Cheap and Cheerful....Great Location!
review: Stayed here with my boyfriend for a week in September. Had a fantastic time! Apartment clean and spacious with nice balcony overlooking pool. Pool was lovely and not too cold with lots of sun beds available. Beach, shops and restaurants within a minutes walk! Staff lovely- especially Jose!!! Couldn’t do enough for us. Would definitely go back!

title: Well worth it!
review: Fantastic, well equipped and spacious apartments. Reception staff are absolutely wonderful and exceptionally helpful. The location was great for us as restaurants and entertainment nearby. We would recommend these apartments to others for value for money.

title: Won't be back
review: Dear Jill W Thank you to spend your time to write a review about our hotel. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to see you again next season. Best regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Great location!
review: First of all they took off the money the day we booked and not when we arrived as promised. Studio was very clean indeed, if a tad basic and small. Fridge was adequate in size. Had to ask for cups.   The bathroom was a good size with a shower and bath. Lovely hot water.  Sheets and towels were changed regularly which was nice.  The balconies were a nice size and sunny but no privacy at all. The pool was very nice with plenty sun loungers.  The nail in the coffin for me was the noise of the dreadful entertainment at night. I asked for a quiet apartment but got block 6😱. I bought sleeping pills from the pharmacy and tried ear plugs; all to no avail!  Why the noise had to go on until midnight I've no idea Didn't try the restaurant.   The folk on the desk were very nice.  Also…

title: perfectly placed in resort
review: Dear Hattitatti Thank you to take your time to write a review about us. Your opinion is really important for us to keep improving. We wish you a nice winter and we hope you give us a second chance. Our best, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Ola ravells
review: Great location literally 2-3 mins walk to shops, bars, restaurants & Cala Gran Beach. We stayed in a studio (ground floor - E6 Room 12) which was quite small compared to others I have stayed at previously. Room had been recently painted & there was a strong odour of paint when we first arrived, it was clean & tidy with modern furnishings. Small terrace/balcony but view wasn’t ideal overlooking dirt patch and fencing, some of the other studios overlooked the pool and I would try & request this if I stayed again. Pool area clean & tidy with sunbeds available all day (Sept), pool was smaller than I’d expected as it looks much bigger on the photo’s. Snack bar area open to public as well as the guests but we didn’t find this a problem at all, reasonably priced food and drinks. …

title: Basic 3 star in good location but let down by pool
review: The room was clean and tidy, had obviously been modernised recently. Compact but co complants about the room. It was cleaned reguarly and well.  The complex is noisy at night with the entertainment, our kids loved it so that was fine for us. It is mainly shows, singers etc that they have on, the kids disco wasn't up to much but the kids seemed happy enough.  The pool looked nice however all our swimwear went yellow after around 20 minutes in the pool. Everyone around the pool was the same, the girls hair started to look a bit green towards the end of the holiday. We complained and both Jet2 and the hotel management could not have been more dismissive of us if they tried.  The management kept trying to blame suntan lotion, we holiday twice a year and some of the outfits have…

title: Family holiday
review: Dear Allan N Thank you very much to let us know your opinion. We are very sorry that your holidays were not what you expected but. We hope to give us a second chance and enjoy your holidays in Ola Es Ravells next summer. Best regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: You get what you pay for!
review: Stayed as a family of four in a one bed apartment, the size was great, with a balcony over looking the pool. Great for when the night time entertainment was on in Tropical Gardens. Nice refurbished rooms, but did lack a bit character. Very central and only a couple of minutes walk to bars and restaurants, beaches close by too.   A couple of issues was that it did get very noisy during the night, nothing to do with the entertainment but we were woken up early hours of the morning by what could only be described as the sound of a Hoover?! I also felt that the room could have been cleaner, we did get beds and towels changed but felt like certain areas were a bit grubby. We thought the air conditioning would have been included also but apparently the price list at reception shows…

title: Stay in OLA Apartamentos Es Ravells D'Or 2017
review: Dear Julie,  Thank you very much for taking your time to write about us. Your opinion are very important for us because improve our services and keep going on. About the air conditioning , it  must have been a mistake. Our air conditioning is for free. We don't  know why you thought that. Hope see you agains enjoying your holidays with us. Our best From Es Ravells Team.

title: Nice stay!
review: There are some unnecessarily harsh reviews about Ravells, ok it's not 5 star but you know that when you book....pay for 3 star and you get a fairly decent 3 star.  The rooms are adequate, very clean and have all the basics you need. We had a 1 bed apartment and it was plenty big enough for 2 adults and 2 children (one of whom is 6 foot and slept very well on the sofa bed!) personally I don't go on holiday to watch tv, sit in the room or do any kind of cooking so it met all our needs - but if you do want to cook anything other than toast or have enough space for a full on rave, you will probably be disappointed.  The entertainment is typical package holiday fayre but there is so much to do in Cala D'Or you don't need to be tied to that every night.  The "animation" during the day…

title: Perfect central location for beaches, shops, bars etc.
review: From the moment of the arrival the staff in this immaculate reception were polite, friendly and very helpful.  We had organised this trip ourselves by booking our own flights, transfers etc. Despite that, the staff kept us fully informed about collection times for our transfer home which took a weight of our minds because one can never be sure that these things are going to work like clockwork, however, they did!  The studio apartment was basic but spotless and contained everything we needed and was of a good standard.  I had read a couple of reviews about the entertainment being too near. I found this a plus because we would sit on our own balcony and just enjoy the show, which was usually cheesy but good fun. By 12.30 each evening the entertainments stopped and we had no…

title: Basic, acceptable, cheap and central location
review: Dear dawntbates, Thank you to spend your time to write a review about Ola Es Ravells. We are glad that you enjoyed your holidays with us. We wish you a nice winter and we hope to see you again next year. Best  regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Our 1st yearly trip
review: Our family stayed here on SC basis (2 adults 2 children) for 2 weeks. The hotel is fairly basic and clean, with the normal basic provisions in the rooms. The rooms are a little small when 4 are sharing, but if you all get on its no real problem. Overall, the hotel is a good base if you are up for exploring the local resort but that's all.  Easy reach of shops, restaurant's and walking distance to several beaches. Bar stays open till late and the music can be a problem if you have a pool view where the bar is also located.   There is nightly entertainment for children and adults at different times. With live groups (look-a-likes) of leading pop singers. This is repeated over 7 days so if you are staying longer than a week you will see the same artists again.  Most people used the…

title: Cheap holiday
review: Dear sukidukes Thank you to take your time to write a review about us. This is good for us to keep improving. We hope to see you again in the near future.  Have a nice rest of the summer. Greetings from the Sunny Cala d'Or, Ola Es Ravells Team.

title: Subaverage
review: We come every year for our 1st holiday and it's always brilliant. Never have any complaints. The staff can't do enough. They are very friendly and professional.  I wouldn't stay anywhere else. I would highly recommend this apartment hotel.

title: Very enjoyable stay!
review: Stayed for 9 nights in studio 6E08 and a few week prior in studio 6E02. Studio 6E02 has a view of the pool and stage; the other room has view of the gardens. Both were plenty big enough for two people and were clean and modern. The single sofa beds were exceptionally comfy; in fact I slept the best I have slept for years on those!   If you are a light sleeper and go to bed before 11.30/midnight you might want to take some ear plugs as the evening entertainment goes on till this time but may not be heard from all apartments. It certainly didn't bother us.   The bathrooms were perfectly adequate and had an excellent power shower above a bath. Please note, the website says there are hairdryers in rooms but there aren't! Please bring your own.   The air con must not have been…

title: Bring back Maru!!
review: Dear  joyg1969 Thank you to take your time to write a review about us. We are happy than you enjoyed your holidays in Ola Es Ravells. We hope to see you again in the near future. Best regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Good little getaway
review: Place isn't the same without the boss! Other than that it was ok. it doesn't feel like the same hotel where we previously had some great memories I'm struggling for two hundred words for the rest of the 200 words.

title: Holiday
review: Dear kieronc583 Thank you to write a review about us. We hope to see you again in the future. Best regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Es Ravells 4th Visit ... Returning Sept Love This Place its a Gem
review: Wanted to get away for a week with my partner at low cost. Es Ravells exceeded expectations as was budget friendly. Very basic rooms but had everything we needed and was mostly clean. Great location with near by beach, restaurants, bars and shops. Entertainment from the bar out the back, and the bar out the front was very loud - not sure if this was just our room or if it's the same for all rooms, but didn't bother us anyway as we were mostly getting involved!

title: very clean
review: stayed here for 5 days very clean and roomy,nice pool area and bar, plenty of entertainment every day and night, ideal for families with small children, always something for them to do with the childrens entertainer, and entertainment for the adults in the evening

title: Excellent! Cant wait to return!!
review: Dear Stephen  Thanks a lot to write a nice coment about us. We hope to see you again in the near future. Greetings from the sunny Cala d'Or. Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Great Apartments!!
review: Stayed here in room 7104. Directly opposite the tropical garden's stage. Absolutely loved the live entertainment every night (singers, parrot shows, reptile shows etc). Apartments were lovely, French doors didnt close properly and door in the room didnt lock so not child proof if you're child likes to try doors! Hollywood bar is very very loud but didnt bother us too much. Had to take the mattress from the living room sofa bed and put it into the room with us as we didnt trust.our 3 year old alone. Towels were only changed once in the week we were there so luckily we took some of our own. Beds were made by cleaners but sheets weren't cleaned.  Cala Gran beach is stunning. Gets busy but sea is lovely and warm/shallow. 5 minute max walk to the town. Glass bottom boat trip was…

title: Very nice and helpful staff.
review: Dear Rachel Thank you to take your time to write a good coment about us. We will pass this review to our animator. We are happy than you enjoyed your holidays and we hope to see you again early enjoying a new holidays whit us. Best regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Tour to Mallorca with a group
review: We have stayed here three times now, and every time we return to Cala D'or we will look to stay here! The staff are friendly and very helpful! On this trip we missed our transfers to the airport to return home, the reception staff were extremely helpful and managed to find us a taxi to the airport (not a short drive!) at very short notice! And thankfully we managed to make it to the airport, just in time!  The apartments themselves are lovely, well modernised since our first stay with comfortable beds and a well equipped kitchen - we always stay Self Catering as we like to try out local restaurants. The bathrooms are very clean and tidy and we had fresh towels at east every other day.  The balcony's are big and our got the sun most of the day if we didn't want to be by the pool…

title: Great accommodation
review: Stayed here for a week in a studio apartment with our 2 year old. The rooms are small but manageable. Great location - close to the beach and centre. Cannot complain at all for the price we paid. Wasn't too keen on Cala D'or itself however would probably return if we found a good enough deal. Would definitely stay at the Ola hotels again.

title: Dave
review: Mss. Stephanie, we are glad to see your nice review about us. We hope to see you and your wonderful family agtain with us in the near future. Best regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: First class holiday accommodation
review: Stayed for 2 weeks, bathroom has not enough room between basin and the bathroom  wall. Was in a 1  bed apartment in block 7 and could do with more work surface to prep food in the kitchen  area when you are staying self catering. You can't take food or drinks down to the pool as it's not part of the hotel.had a good holiday except for the couple of issues

title: Nice, small, not expensive apartments near the center
review: Mr. Dave, We appreciate your opinion and we are very sorry for the problems that you had. We are glad to read that finally your holidays was great at Ola Es Ravells, we hope to see you again in the near future. Have a really nice winter, Kind regards, The Manager & The Team

title: Excellent Apartments
review: Excellent apartments, a little basic but then you don't need loads of cooking facilities when you have so many bars and restaurants at your disposal.  We stayed in block 6 and if you want to have an apartment with a view of the pool and stage then you need to ask for one in either block 6 or 7.  Evening entertainment was great (although the last nights woman singer was dreadful).  Staff are brilliant, very helpful and always on hand.  Would definitely recommend and would stay again, excellent value for money.

title: Hotel fully booked on arrival!
review: I arrived at the hotel late at night following my transfer from the airport. On arrival I filled in forms and then was told that the hotel was full for three days due to "an overbooking" and we would need to go to a different hotel. This shows poor organisation between the hotel and travel operator and was a huge inconvenience to our stay as we could not properly unpack at the replacement hotel. The reception staff were apologetic and I understood it wasn't their fault. The lady with glasses on reception remembered us and gave us some free stuff.   When we did finally get to stay in our original hotel we had a one bedroom apartment in block 7. The entrance to the apartments is via a lift shaft on the Main Street and involved moving the suitcases up and down the steep incline to…

title: Now I know why they didn't get back to me....
review: Dear Gracieg Thank you to write a review about us. Please accept our apologies for this inconvenience at the moment of your arrival. We hope to see you again in the near future. Have a really nice winter. Best regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Lovely clean apartments in central location with good management
review: We booked in October 2015 for a 10 day stay in September 2016. I emailed, I sent a message by fb and trip advisor. I even tried to ring to see if I could get a particular room or at least a quiet block. No one got back to me. Probably because I was double booked! This happened to two couple's last year when we stayed. This year, it happened to us and three other families! Luckily the travel company rang us two days before and found us somewhere else. I'm not usually one to complain or write negative reviews but I think the way es ravells is managed is disgraceful. People spend their hard earned cash on accommodation and look forward to their holidays. To be told the place you booked is no longer available is terrible. The accommodation we were moved to was stunning and we came…

title: Disappointing
review: Dear Carolynda We are very sorry for this inconveniences, please accept our apologies, this year was very difficult in the whole island as well, is not an excuse.  We are happy to see that finally you had a nice holidays. Sincerally, The Manager

title: Fantastic apartments had a lovely break
review: Stayed here with my husband and 2 daughters recently. We had a one bedroom apartment which was no problem as the girls slept in the living room on the sofas which were just like proper beds -would be ideal for adults too. As we arrived late we had no food or drink as everything was shut but the bar staff were very helpful and sorted us with water and drinks to take up to the room (although quite expensive it was what we needed). The location is perfect just a walk down the road to the beach (which is beautiful) and you can go either into centre of Cala D'or about 5 minutes walk but is heaving with restaurants or as you come out the main entrance go straight ahead to streets of shops and things for the children  (bouncy castles go karts etc). Plenty to do although was surprised…

title: Very good appartment
review: Whe arrived late at night to find a appartment with only 2 beds for 3 adults! Went straight down to reception to complain and was told they would get it sorted asap! So we decided to go out for a drink and returned about 1 hour later to find no bed, just as i was about to go back to reception the lady arrived with a fold up bed!! At the time i thought hear we go its going to be holiday from hell!! But the next morning we realised the room (a studio)  was a little to small for 3 people but we accepted it and got on with the holiday, from then on the maids, pool area and bar were excellent, and the area is beautiful! I would recomend these appts to anyone but if there is 3 or more, go for a 1 bedroom and not a studio as these are really only suitable for 2 people also you get FREE…

title: The best hotel in Cala D'or
review: Dear Scott, We are glad that you enjoy your holidays with us. Thank you for this precious comment. Hope to see you soon among us, we wish you a nice winter :) Best regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Amazing apartment.
review: I would recommend this hotel to anyone. Marut and the staff make you feel at home from the minute you arrive. The pool is fantastic and the atmosphere is laid back, the rooms are clean and spacious and offer fantastic value for money.

title: Very relaxing
review: Dear costumer, Thank you to write a nice review about our hotel. We are very happy that see you enjoy your holidays with us. We hope to see you in the near future. Greetings from the sunny Es Ravells :) Maru & The Staff

title: Couldn't fault this place
review: I booked these apartments not knowing they had been under refurbishment. The whole apartment was modern and clean. I cannot fault anything from this holiday. Great hotel to sit on the balcony and watch the evening entertainment. I will be visiting again.

title: All you need and really well placed in the town
review: Clean and centrally located. Really well placed for the beach. Good pool. Good air conditioning.  Our kettle was broken and kept tripping our electrics, but was replaced when we reported it to the reception.  Staff all very helpful.

title: Fabulous
review: Dear guest Thank you to take your time to write an opinion about us. We are really happy to see you enjoyed your holidays in Ola Es Ravells. We will pass this message to the staff. We hope to see you again next summer. Best regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: great location
review: So sad that this is our last day here. Fabulous hotel, rooms modern and very clean. Staff can't do enough for you, and help to make your stay a good one. Will defiantly be recommending this hotel to friends and family and will certainly be coming back ourselves.

title: Our holiday
review: Dear guest Thank you to spend your time to write your lovely review. We are glad to know that you had a wonderful week here with us. Please send us an email before you are coming. Have a nice winter. Greetings from the sunny Cala D'Or, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Great holiday
review: We stayed here for 2 weeks recently and found good and bad things with this place. Staff were always very helpful, we had to stay in studio for first night as no 1 bed apt available, we were told this was because original booking through low cost hols was cancelled & had to be re-booked, however hotel staff were very apologetic & gave us a bottle of wine & free use of room safe for 2 weeks as compensation. We had a few issues with the room at times & these were attended to promptly & there was free wifi in the room. The set up with Tropical Garden & the pool area is a bit confusing but they do need to get some more sunbeds, however the same families would be down every day to reserve beds for themselves whether they used them or not. Entertainment at Tropical Garden was mainly…

title: Disappointing
review: My friend and I spent a large amount of money to stay in these apartments and I have to say we were not best pleased. The room itself was fine despite being on the ground floor with absolutely no view whatsoever however, the maids did a great job of cleaning.   It was the entertainment staff that really let the place down. The acts of entertainment each night were fabulous- particularly the black eyed peas and michael jackson/bruno mars.   However, I had a horrific encounter with the 'kids entertainer' who made several rude comments about my friend and I while we were watching the shows. We were extremely humiliated and felt very uncomfortable for the rest of the stay. Considering we paid such a huge amount of money, we did not expect to be insulted by the childrens entertainer…

title: Nice stay - need to sort sunbeds
review: Thank you very much to take the time to write your opinion about us. I am very sorry for the inconvenience during your stay. I already spoke with the entertainer to be sure this matter will never happen again. He apologize for the misunderstanding. I will keep the control on him, please accept my apologize. I hope you to give us a second chance and come again to visit Es Ravells and have a nice conversation together. Sincerely Maru Curutchet

title: Fantastic Stay in the Ola Apartamentos Es Ravells D'Or
review: Booked over 9 months ago, arrived after a long day travelling to be told our apartment would not be ready for 2 days and we'd need to stay in the nearby (across the road) Sol Hotel. Apartment there was nice enough but this wasn't ideal with a 4 year old. Receptionist at Ravells was apologetic and walked us over to the Sol Hotel. We then had to wait another 20 minutes to get checked in here. Would advice Ravells that if they are asking guests to stay at a different hotel that they arrange with Sol to have their rooms ready. We'd been up since 4am.  For the inconvenience we got free breakfast at sol for 2 days and free safety deposit box at Ravells.  When we got our apartment at Ravells it was nice and clean, larger than expected and looking out over the pool area.  The pool is…

title: Very small indeed!
review: Dear Lauren Thank you for spend your time to write a review about us. We are very sorry for these inconveniences at your first day, but we are happy that finally you were pleasant enjoying your holidays with us. We hope to see you again in the near future. Have a really nice winter :) Best regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: family holiday
review: We stayed again this year in Ola Apartamentos Es Ravells D'Or & I honestly can not speak highly enough of Maru & her staff again this year, they made the 3 of us feel so welcome everyday & always had a smile & always had time for a chat with us or Ryan or if you needed any help with anything if they could accommodate in helping you they would . The apartments were spotless and cleaned every 2 days & if you did need fresh towels you could have them daily, the air con was spot on, the location is very central pretty much within walking distance of all shops, restaurants etc etc. I'm already looking forward to going back next year to such a wonderful place with wonderful staff in a wonderful location.

title: Last minute deal
review: Booked through 'travel soon' and wasn't sure what to expect as booking was changed several times (beds not available at chosen accommodation) however my daughter and I were delighted with our apartment. 3rd floor corner studio, two balconies, clean and comfortable. Staff very friendly and helpful, nightly entertainment- bit cheesy but fun, pool exceptionally clean - I watched the pool guy clean it every morning. Less than 5 minutes walk to small clean beach. Plenty of restaurants with very similar prices- average 50e for 2 sharing a simple starter, dinner and drinks.

title: Family holiday
review: Dear Cazjay Thank's a lot for your review. We are very happy that you enjoy your holidays in Ola Es Ravells and we hope to see you again in the near future. Have a nice winter :)  Greetings from the sunny Cala D'Or, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Ola Apartamentos Es Ravells D'or
review: We have just got back from Ola es Revells and as usual a perfect holiday. This hotel is the best, Maru and Paco are amazing people who will go out of their way to help you. The apartment was spotless as usual, all of the maids were friendly and nothing was too much trouble. This is our fourth time going to this hotel and already we are planning for next year. It really is the best.

title: Decent place we had minor issues upon arrival.
review: Dear Debbie Thank's a lot for this wonderful opinion about us. We are really happy that you enjoy your holidays with us. We can't wait to see you again nest year. Please send us an email before you are coming. Have a really nice winter :)  A lot of greetings from the sunny Cala D'Or, Maru & Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Great holiday
review: Stayed here for 11 days 2adults/2kids15&10. Rooms clean &modern. Pool area always clean too. Staff very friendly and helpful. Great location and everthing in walking distance. Nightly entertainment at poolside bar very good and varied with fairly professional acts overseen by Liam the resident, full of energy, rep. Would highly recommend and will definitly go back

title: Good standard accomodation in a great location
review: Our long awaited family holiday hit a hitch when on arrival we didn't have an apartment and had to stay at the hotel across the road.  The receptionist Jose was very apologetic, and assured us we would be happy with the apartment we would get the following day.  He was right, the apartment we eventually got was a good size, we had a balcony and a terrace and it overlooked the pool. The luxury of overlooking the pool meant we could enjoy the evening entertainment from our room if we didn't want to stay downstairs in the tropical garden bar.  The apartment was well equipped and was cleaned on several occasions during our 8 (should have been 9) night stay, and all the staff at the apartments were all very friendly and helpful.  Only a 2 minute walk to Cala Gran beach, with all the…

title: Ok hotel
review: I stayed for 4 nights with 2 friends. We shared one apartment with sofa beds. Beds were ok. Air conditioning is quite poor and we found at some moments we would have liked it to be cooler. We barely managed to get sun beds by the pool, the area is pretty crowded at times.  The pool closes at 18.30 which is a shame. They should have a second pool that stays open longer. The evening entertainment pretty good considering that we are on a small Island in the mediterranean. But noise from singing can be heard from the apartments until midnight. Location of the hotel is really good.

title: Very dissapointed!
review: Booked this accommodation due to the great reviews and were very disappointed on arrival. For the life of me I cannot understand why the reviews were so great. Firstly a positive our room was ok, spacious and comfy. Rooms clean but not spotlessly cleaned as per other reviews. Rooms were just swept and never appeared to be mopped however they were ok just scrapping the 3 star rating I would say. Our bathroom flooded overnight but to be fair was fixed within a couple of hours so no big problem, we were however without hot water for two days which was inconvenient to say the least.   Now to the rest of the place. Our balcony over looked some "gardens" these were not well maintained, the path to the pool were uneven and dirty and  the bin area was often overflowing. The locals…

title: Visited many times
review: I have stayed in Cala D'or many times over the years and I think you will be hard pressed to find accommodation that is as good as this place.  The rooms have all been renovated recently and to a high standard.  The pool is excellent as is the entertainment during the day and also during the evening there is a mini disco for the kids and then attribute act to finish the night off. All entertainment finishes at Midnight so very quiet after then. Any problems and the manageress Maru will go to great lengths to sort them out. Give it a try you will not be disappointed

title: Worst apartments we have ever stayed in
review: Thank you very much for spend your time to write this fantastic review about our Hotel. We are happy that your stay with us was perfect. We hope to see you again enjoying your holidays with us in the near future. Greetings from the sunny Cala D'Or, The Manager - Maru

title: Good apartments for a good price
review: Have just returned from a weeks stay here and we were very pleased with our stay.  We had a 1 bed apartment in block 6. The apartments are very clean and nicely decorated. We were apprehensive at the thought of having to sleep on sofa beds for the week but were relieved that these were actually 2 single beds with proper mattresses. The air con was a bit hit and miss but was on during the evening when getting ready so didn't really bother us too much. Rooms were kept clean and towels changed regularly and reception were very helpful and friendly when we needed something.  Pool area was great and was still able to get a sunbed at 9am, so no early morning alarm. My only criticism is that we found the pool bar a little expensive, but the evening entertainment is great. All in all we…

title: Some problems but still enjoyed
review: Dear Rachel Thank's a lot for this wonderful review about us. We are glad that you enjoy your holidays with us and we hope to see you again next summer. Please send us an email before you are coming. Have a nice summer and a not to cold winter in London ;)  Best regards, Ola Es Ravells Team

title: Very Disappointing!
review: Please do not be put off by what I am about to say. Room was 1 bed apart. Very nice as we had one of the refurbished ones. Very comfortable beds however air conditioning only came on between something like 6pm and 2 am the reason why I am vague is because I could not tell difference when it was on !!! I did report it but nothing was done. We also had no hot water for 2/3 days whilst a part was being sourced. Our fridge did not work but was replaced quickly. To top it off we were woken at 3.50am on our last night there for a wake up call we did not request. Could not then get back off to sleep which ruined my last day. I do think the hotel should have offered some sort of compensation for the lack of hot water. A simple voucher to use for food/drinks would have been appreciated. …

title: Great hotel
review: After reading all reviews on this property we decided to book two rooms, one bedroom apartment for myself, husband and two children and one studio for my Mother and Aunt for 10 night holiday.  The rooms were more basic than anticipated for the price.  Not much room in the bathrooms and in the studio apartment you had to sit sideways on the toilet!  Also the pool area was certainly not huge as described and anyone who drinks at the bar can come in and use the pool.  When we checked in we were charged double the rate for safety deposit key than weekly stay.  We were charged 30 Euro for safety deposit for the 10 days (15 Euro for 7 nights), weekly and 10 days receive 6 euro back when return key.  Also when we checked in we were told that are room would be cleaned 3 times per week…

title: May 2016
review: Dear Jules Thank's a lot for your time in writing your review and help  to keep improving our service. We are sorry that your stay was not to your liking and also very sorry for the problem that you had. We hope you give us a second chance and look again in Ola Es Ravells. Best Regards, The Manager

title: FABOULOUS APARTMENTS
review: We have just returned after a last minute 3 night break with 2 kids. Last stayed here 5 years ago with 20 guests for our wedding and had an brilliant holiday. The hotel manager Maru is AMAZING lady and nothing is too much trouble for her to sort, even left a note & gift in our room to welcome us back .Everything is run ship shape and to a very high standard. The place has been refurbished to an lovely modern Mediterranean white/grey design which even has proper bed mattresses on the sofa beds. Nice to see the same staff on reception too which shows you that Boss knows how to look after the workforce. We look forward to book again in September as we've had such a good holiday. Best apartments in Cala D'or by far in my opinion as I've stayed in many others 😊

title: Lovely place
review: Dear Friends Thank's a lot for your review. We are happy that you enjoy your stay with us once again in Ola Es Ravells. It was nice to see you here again.  Have a nice summer in the meantime see you in September ;) Best regards, Ola Es Ravells Team & Maru

title: Clean, Comfortable, Perfect Location
review: Stayed here end of May.....had read all reviews.....brill place....rooms lovely....all staff very friendly nothing too much trouble....bar and entainment area good....would def stay again. 15 mins to the lovely Marina and 5 mins to the centre.....lots of restaurants and bars.

title: Es ravells appartments  Cala D'or
review: Thanks a lot for this fantastic review about your stay in our hotel. We are glad that you enjoy your holidays with us and we hope to see you again in the near future in Ola Es Ravells. Greetings from the sunny Cala D'Or : ) Ola Es Ravells Team

title: 5 star ES RAVELLS
review: This hotel has a perfect location. A short walk from the beaches, restaurants and bars.  The rooms are very spacious and modern for Spanish standards. Fully equipt for a self catering holiday. The room/bathroom was very clean. I was very impressed.  The pool area is very big and the bar/restaurant is very good. I ate lunch there everyday. Entertainment isn't really my thing but it's really good if you have kids.  My mum was also staying in Cala D'or in another hotel. She loved our hotel so much that she booked herself in.  Next time I come to Cala D'or I'll book this hotel.

title: Good location
review: This hotel has a really good location. It is 5 mins walk to the square where all the restaurants are, it's about 15 mins walk to the marina and 5 mins to the main Cala gran beach. The staff in reception were very helpful and friendly. The room was clean and had a nice big terrace overlooking the pool. We used the hotel as a base so didn't try the bar for food, entertainment etc. Great for the price we paid.

title: A long needed break
review: Dear Tracey  Thank you to spend your time in writing about us. We are happy that you enjoy your stay with us and we hope to see you again in Ola Es Ravells. Greetings from the sunny Cala D'Or, The Management.

title: No frills - but a lovely hotel
review: What an amazing hotel the rooms were spotless everything we needed was in the room the staff were all very pleasant and helpful and we enjoyed staying at this hotel so much we have just rebooked to come back in October for a longer stay.  We were able to get free wifi in our apartment which was a blessing and the live entertainment every night in tropical garden was always a pleasure to watch. This hotel has everything great location for shops supermarkets bars ice cream parlours beaches and no end of places to eat & drink when needed.  Myself & my partner flew back to the uk last night and we were sad we were leaving & we both wished we could have stayed longer hence rebooking in October 2016 to return.   Thank you ever so much for everything you did whilst we were staying with…

title: Holidays
review: Dear Brian & Sue Thank's a lot for your review. It is nice to know that you enjoy your stay in Ola Es Ravells. We can't wait to see you again next october. Remember to send me a mail before you come. Have a nice summer in the meantime! Best wishes, Maru & the staff :)

title: Excellent entertainment
review: We stayed here last week, had booked online direct on the hotel website. When we arrived, we were greeted by reception and given our hotel key card. Went into the room and it was smaller than a hamster cage, probably mainly my fault but I had booked a studio room.  There was no bed!  Just two sofas, which turned into beds, so basically you slept right next to the kitchen. I immediately discussed the matter with reception, and asked for a room upgrade, 75 euro later it was sorted, and we had our own bedroom.    We were then really happy, the room was very clean, and spacious. Beds were comfy. TV didn't work so we had to contact reception and that took around an hour to fix. Kitchens had a worktop hob, toaster, sink and microwave all of which were spotless.  There was no…

title: Basic apartments
review: We first visited Es ravell dor in 2005.  Things have been maintained to a minimum and no real improvements made.   Our holiday was a cheapy and if your really not fussy then this will do, however even I was a bit unhappy with the smelly toilet, the ant infestation, the lack of air con or fans and the lack of self catering facilities.   We really love Cala dor and have been several times now but won't be returning to Es ravell.

title: Fabulous stay
review: Thank you very much for your review. This is very important for us to keep improving. We are sorry that your stay was not to your liking. We hope you give us a second chance and look again in Ola Es Ravells. Kind regards, The Management.

title: Great value for money
review: We booked a first time, last minute trip to the Es Ravells apartments in Cala D'Or and were more than pleasantly surprised.  The apartment itself was on the first floor of Block 6, it overlooked the pool, was clean & comfortable, the complex was close to the beach and the amenities of the town, the staff were friendly & helpful and there was entertainment every night in the Tropical Garden.  We would definitely return and book again.

title: Never again!
review: Dear Angel  Thank you to spend your time in write about your stay in our hotel. We are happy that you enjoy your holidays and we hope to see you again. Please send us an email before you are coming. Best regards, Ola Es Ravells Team.

title: Lovely stay
review: We have been here many times and love the central location and having an apartment enables self-catering. Everthing is within easy walking distance. The staff is always extremely helpful and friendly.  The nightly entertainment goes on until midnight so do not expect an early night.

title: First visit
review: Hotel very clean and close to everything. Staff are friendly and helpful. The Tropical garden and  Pool adjacent is lovely, friendly with an array of entertainment. You are a hairs breath from the centre and one of the beachs.

title: Great Location and accommodation.
review: Thank you very much for your opinion, we like to know that you spend a pleasant stay in our hotel. Hope to see you again. Have a nice and not very rainy winter. Greetings from the sunny Cala D'Or! The Management

title: annual holiday
review: We stay here every time we visit Cala D'or. Self catering in an apartment. Lovely staff, great location, clean and comfortable accommodation. Reasonable prices too. Very close to the centre of Cala D'or. Visit the marina for great food and views. Visit Dugans Irish bar for great live music.

title: had a great time. first time in cala d,or.
review: Hello Thank you very much for your opinion, this makes us very happy and help to continue improving. We hope to see you again in the near future. Please send us an e-mail before your arrival and we will try our best. Have a nice winter. Kind regards The Management

title: Amazing holiday! Amazing hotel!!
review: This is the 6th visit to this hotel and from years past it has much improved. It has been a very comfortable stay with friendly staff available 24/7. Being so close to all amenities makes this a very popular hotel. We are now looking forward to next stay

title: 1st holiday for years
review: Amazing. This hotel deserves 5 stars and I can not fault it. The staff were very helpful and nothing was too much trouble. It was very clean and unlike some places the maids were not noisy in the mornings 😊😊😊

title: Es Ravells
review: Thank's a lot for your time, your opinion is very important for us. We are glad that you enjoy your holidays and hope to see you in the near future and spend again an amazing holidays whit us. Greetings from the sunny Cala D'Or! The Management

title: Brilliant hotel
review: Had a great stay at Es Ravells.  We stayed in block 6 top floor and had great views of the live music acts at the Tropical Gardens, which I have to say were  fantastic.  The rooms were cleaned every other day and were spotless.  The complex is ideally situated, less than 5 mins to the beach and 10 to the square with all the restaurants, with shops along the way.  We ate in Supertramps most days which is just across the road, had some fab meals and very reasonable. Never had a problem getting a bed by the pool. I can highly recommend if you're thinking of staying here.  Cala D'or is a beautiful resort with something for everyone.

title: Good apartment - however a lot of noise
review: Thank you for your nice opinion about us, always is grateful to hear that our guests enjoy the time whit us. We are working hard to keep improving Es Ravells and make everybody happy. Hope to see you next year. Kind regards The Management

title: Love this place!
review: Fantastic hotel close to all restaurants and beaches. Rooms very clean and Maids cleaned every other day and changed towels etc. fantastic pool and bar. Entertainment was pretty good. Definitely recommend

title: Simple and central
review: Our first time in Cala D'or and indeed on this island.  This hotel is ideally places for all of the bars and restaurants in the town and has a nice pool complex.  Our room (Block 6, 12) was small and compact with two single beds that we pushed together.  The room was quiet and the air con free and pretty efficient.  We can't comment on the nightly entertainment was we were too busy in many fine bars and restaurants!

title: Fabulous As Always
review: Thank you very much for your time, your opinion is very important for us to improve our service. We hope to see you again in Es Ravells. Kind regards  The Management

title: Es ravells
review: Once again we had a fabulous stay at Es Ravells.  Maru and her staff are fantastic, so helpful and such lovely, approachable people.  The apartments have all been totally refurbished and are gorgeous, really bright and fresh.  There is a microwave, kettle and toaster in the apartments and a laundry room on site. The pool area is clean and tidy and there's plenty of beds.  The beach is a 2 minute walk away and the main town is only a few minutes further.  I cannot recommend these apartments highly enough and will be returning again.

title: Good Stay
