review: Hello, nice to hear you did enjoy once again your stay with us, that help us to keep going along all the season and keep working hard year after year. I hope to see you again next year and don't forget to send me a mail before your arrival. Have a nice winter!!  Hasta pronto Amigos ;-)

title: Good value
review: Lovely place, lovely restaurants, beautiful bays, really enjoyed it. The people are nice, worth a visit, not to noisy really nice for families what else can I say. And the water park is fun for the kids and the starfish boat trips, and the marina is gorgeous with some lovely restaurants aswell .

title: Great value
review: We stayed in a studio which was plenty of room for three of us, sleeping on two sofas plus a pull out bed. The rooms are fairly modern and not tired looking like some I have stayed in and also look like they have been recently decorated. Staff are friendly and always happy to help. Cleaners visit every other day. Hotel is in a central location and is noisy up until midnight with live music. Ask for block 4 for maximum peace and quite if required. Block 7 is the noisiest as there is a karaoke bar below which goes on after midnight. The beach is a 2 minute walk one way and the shops, bars and restaurants 2 minutes another way. The marina is around a 10 minute walk. The pool is open to the public but doesn't get overly busy. The bar shows sport when on and prices are about average…

title: Family holiday
review: Tank's a lot for your time,  your opinion is very important for us.  We are glad that you enjoy your holidays and hope to see you in the near future. Grettings from the suuny Cala D'Or!! The Management

title: Absolutely disgusting...sick splattered on the bed sheets!
review: Main reception staff polite unfortunately not able to help sometimes,very clean well presented apartment, with 2 balconies, block 7 206, would have liked more clothes storage as for 4 or us not enough space, missing 1 couch in living area but we used fold up bed, lovely large patio balcony shame that they didn't put sun-loungers on there for full benefit, bathroom well if you couldn't fit through a 13" gap between wash basin & wall you wont reach the toilet or bath! Air con was quite poor when on between 12 lunch time -7am but adequate, wi-fi you could get some in room as we were near reception, in reception area not too bad. Kettle would take ages to boil as it cut in out (apparently all hotels are like this says manager!) We were over looking pool area & Tropical Garden bar…

title: Holiday Stay
review: Tank's a lot for your time,  your opinion is very important for us.  We are happy that you enjoy your holidays and hope to see you in the future. Kind Regards!! The Management

title: Don't be fooled by the pictures!
review: We originally booked to stay at the Cala d'Or Playa but Jet2holidays and the hotel overbooked the hotel and we had to stay in Es Ravells for 2 nights.   On arrival we were personally greeted by the manager, who seemed nice.  On entering our room we were first greeted by the terrible smell, it smelt like stale cigarettes, it was awful. On further inspection of the room we found sick splatters on the bed sheets, rusty and stained fridge, cobwebs hanging from the roof, broken roof tiles, grime on the shower, rusty shower head.   We ended up complaining to the Jet2holidays rep who came out to see the room and was shocked at the state of disrepair. She spoke to the manager and some of the problems were fixed immediately, which was a slight improvement.   When we checked out the…

title: Time of my Life!!
review: I will never forget the 5 days I spent in Cala D'Or!! From the moment I arrived,I knew this was the beginning of a special vacation. The staff were incredibly helpful from the get go, and extremely accommodating! I live in Canada, and my stepfather booked this excursion for me while I was visiting him in England. I had no idea where I was going, but would love to be able to return there again. I made several friends, and will cherish the memories I took from there!

title: Basic apartments in a great location
review: Tank's a lot for your time,  your opinion is very important for us.  We are glad that you enjoy your holidays and hope to see you in the near future. Grettings from the suuny Cala D'Or!! The Management

title: Live Entertainment nightly
review: The apartments are basic but adequate for a family of four. We stayed in block 6 which has a lift and the rooms have been recently redecorated. The kitchen has a fridge, microwave, kettle (think ours was a bit dodgy though as water not always totally boiled!) and a small hob. The air conditioning was fine- on all day and very welcome!! Depeding on the room you are allocated you may or may not have a double balcony- we didn't but there was plenty of room for the four of us plus an inflatable boat and the handy washing line. The room was cleaned every other day and bed linen changed once during our 10 day stay. The reception staff, Jose and Paco are very helpful and friendly, they were able to advise on day trips (which can be booked at the reception) as well as local maps and…

title: Great holiday July 2015
review: Tank's a lot for your time,  your opinion is very important for us.  We are glad that you enjoy your holidays and hope to see you in the near future. Grettings from the suuny Cala D'Or!! The Management

title: Disappointing
review: I haven't stayed in this hotel but the bar area 'Tropical Gardens'  of the hotel is open to the public and there is free nightly entertainment.  There is a mini disco for the kids nightly before the main show and 3 times a week they also put on a parrot/reptile/birds of prey show.  Once you have got your table, it is waiter service and the 2 main waiters Tony and Paco couldn't be more helpful. We have seen some really good shows in the few years we have been going, but the best act we have seen, what The New Jersey Boys who were playing there this year.  We saw them both weeks of our stay. They are 4 lads from the UK who obviously enjoy what they do and the chemistry shows in there performance. The first half of the act is dedicated to the music of the Jersey Boys which will…

title: Poor
review: Not a very good hotel:  Airco only at nights. Beds are terrible. Pool restaurant is not part of the hotel. So you cant bring your own drinks and food.  Please keep looking for another hotel in Malloraca, there are plenty of them.

title: Perfect location
review: Tank's a lot for your time,  We are sorry that your stay at our hotel was not good. We appreciate your opinion and we will work hard to improve. Kind regards!! The Management

title: Good holiday with good location
review: Stayed here for a week so we could attend wedding nearby in the yacht club. Glad we did. On arrival we were told the studio rooms were not quite ready so they upgraded us to two appartments. All good. Situation for the rest of Cala D'or was great with all you could want within a few minutes walk. Desk staff and bar staff were very polite and friendly. Never ate here but we were meeting people every night. Cala D'or is a lovely place and if I was to return I would have no hesitation in booking these apartments.

title: Great Holiday
review: Tank's a lot for your time,  your opinion is very important for us.  We are happy that you enjoy your holidays and hope to see you again in Ola Es Ravells! Kind regards !! The Management

title: Lovely clean friendly hotel
review: We stayed in a studio self catering apartment for two weeks at the beginning of July 2015. The hotel was really close to all the restaurants and within walking distance to a few beaches, the closest being Cala Gran. There was also the electric solar train bus stop outside the hotel. The marina was also only approx a 15-20 mins walk away.The room was as expected for a studio apartment, towels were changed regularly although the floor never seemed particularly brushed, the bits of sand seemed to be pushed under the table. Could have done with a brush in the studio to sweep up sand ourselves to stop it getting on our feet all the time. There was free Wifi in the hotel lobby and nightly live entertainment shows in the tropical gardens bar by the pool. We were in block 6, away from…

title: Great week
review: This is the second time we have stayed at these apartments and throughly enjoyed ourselves.  The apartments have been  refurbished this time they are clean and bright. The entertainment was excellent and Aer made our holiday. He was really helpful and good fun. We would definitely book again.

title: wish it had been longer
review: Thank you for your opinion.  It is very important for us.  We are happy that you had a good holiday at our hotel.  Hope to see you soon!!  Greetings from the Sunny Cala d'Or!  The Staff

title: A++
review: Stayed at the ravels D'or 11th -18th May.  We had a great apartment, very clean with lovely big balconies The apartment number was 501 and you got the sun most of the day. You could here the music from the Tropical Gardens Bar but not loud enough to bother you. The staff here were fantastic, the staff on reception could not do enough for people. I wish now that I had booked for 2 weeks instead on 1. Will be going back to these apartments again.

title: Mrs K Donoghue,    Brilliant place to stay
review: Thank you for your opinion.  It is very important for us.  We are happy that you had a good holiday at our hotel.  Hope to see you soon!!  Greetings from the Sunny Cala d'Or!  The Staff

title: Mr and mrs smart
review: Been home a month now, and forget to write a review. but here it is...   Es Ravells D'or is a very friendly, comfortable clean play to stay. it was our first holiday as a couple and we are so glad we picked here. the staff were so friendly and helpful. (even at 2:30 in the morning when we arrived). We stayed in Room 6E00 and was SO clean. and well kept. Maid service every other day. they was Really quick and in and out before we knew it. Our view from our balcony was spot on too!! We was pool view, and could see everything from there. even the night time entertainment. Es Ravells is a few minutes walk from the town center, beach, local shops and restaurants/bars.   the bar and restaurant at the hotel (tropical gardens) is also a nice place to go and sit, have a cocktail or two.…

title: Brilliant holiday place
review: This was a very pleasant place to stay and the staff are very polite it's also  very clean too they definitely make you feel welcome. The bar staff at tropical gardens where ace and the pool was very nice and clean. Me and my partner would come here again maybe in a few years time the only down fall was the coach journey to the place from palma airport it's about 2 hours drive but it was OK. It's also 5 minutes walk away from the beach is the hotel and even that is very clean many thanks to all the staff :)

title: wonderful
review: Thank's a lot for your time,   your opinion is very important for us.   Thank you so much for your good opinion about our hotel and the staff, we work hard to do the best for our guests and we appreciated your satisfaction.  Hope to see you in the near future  Grettings from the suuny Cala D'Or!!  The Managment

title: good all round
review: Well equipped spotless apartment everything looked brand new. The towels were changed 3 times during the week which was great. I stayed in block 4 which was perfect, i would imagine blocks 5/6 would be a little noisy as they are closer to the entertainment, but in 4 although i could still hear the singing it wasn't too intrusive   ( it also finished about 12ish anyway). The staff were all very helpful and knowledgeable about the areas bus routes and timetables for example and the Apartments are perfectly placed for exploring the Calas ( on the road train )and indeed all Majorca.

title: Great stay
review: Thank you so much for taking your time and help us to improve our service.  We always working hard to do the to do the best for our guests and appreciate so much your opinion.   We hope to see you in the near future.  Grettings from the sunny Cala D'Or!!  The Management

title: Would be 5 stars but was too noisy for us
review: stayed here for week,enjoyed every minute,rooms clean and tidy,staff friendly,entertainment ok,we had good room looking over pool and entertainment so in evening could sit on balcony cheap bottle of wine and be entertained,close to all amenities,short walk to nice beach,would go back

title: Great stay
review: Me and my partner had booked to stay in a studio, on arrival we were told that there was no studios available and if we stopped at another hotel for 2 nights (free) and then go back we would be upgraded to an apartment which was great we got a spacious apartment with a huge wrap around balcony paco also give us safe key and remote for free. The pool is great just a shame about having to stop using it so early. Es ravells is in a good central location very close to plenty of restaurants and bars, also very close to the beach. I would stop here again but maybe when im older as great as cala dor is there is not much for a 22 and 23 year old. Apartments are fab though.

title: A good central location
review: We enjoyed our stay at the Es Ravells D'or.  We staying in a studio apartment overlooking the pool.  The room was clean & quite spacious.  My only issue was as I am 6ft 4 tall the single beds which also doubled up as settees had wooden sides which prevented me from stretching out a night!.  The tropical garden pool bar & entertainment was very good, however being told on our first night on the 3rd October that the food was running out wasn't great! For relatively cheap accommodation in a central location, we would go back....

title: Excellent value
review: Stayed from 16th October to 22nd first of all i would highly advise that u do not book the bus transfer to the hotel got on the bus at 10am sat on it for over one hour before we departed arrived at the hotel at 12,30 so it took longer to get from the airport to hotel than to fly from Doncaster pay for a taxi it realy is worth it when we did finaly get to es revells we were greeted with a great smile and walm welcome my partner was even given a cold beer Paco was very helpfull upgraded from a studio to a larger room in block 6 third floor rooms very clean beds good this was the week that the hotel was closing for the end of the season big mistake for us Thursday until Sunday was fine then after that things started to disapear sun beds parasols tables all around the pool and bar…

title: Lovely surprise
review: This was a last minute holiday for my mum and myself and it was a lovely holiday.  The hotel is clean, the apartment had a fantastic wrap around balcony overlooking the pool area.  We went self catering, there were plenty of restaurants to choose from, las palmers restaurant (pedro's corner) is a gem, lovely food, good presentation and the best service.  The beach is about 300metres away in a straight line, it has good facilities, clean toilets cafe's and shops.  The sun beds i thought were expensive 13 euro for two sun beds and parasol.  This perfect for couples and families as there is plenty to do all within walking distance.  Cala  D'or is a lovely Spanish town, not like palma nova or magaluf, it is a small town with coves and history. Enjoy :)

title: A LATE SUMMER BREAK IN CALA D'OR
review: Two weeks ago my wife and I returned from a 14 day holiday to Mallorca. We stayed at the Hotel ‘Apartamentos Es Ravells D’or’ within easy walking distance to the town center of Cala d’Or. We had a wonderful fortnight, the apartment was very clean with three verandas, one outside the bedroom, one outside the kitchenette area and the other outside the lounge. All the staff at the hotel were very friendly and helpful, the maid especially so. However there are always things which mar the holiday.  When we arrived in resort the bus dropped us off outside our hotel. To get to the reception was a fairly steep downward slope, steps or ramp. So, down we went with our luggage, Paco, the receptionist, a great guy, booked us in,  allocated us our accommodation gave us the safe key and…

title: Another perfect stay!
review: My partner & I stayed here for the second year running after a wonderful time last year! We requested the same apartment as last year via email direct to the hotel as the room was perfect for us and they managed to move things around and get us into the same apartment we had last year. The staff were more than helpful and were always more than happy to help, should we need them to! Plenty of sunbeds and the bar staff are hilarious! Entertainment every night was fab and finished at a reasonable time. The pool was gorgeous, got the sun almost all day and was very well kept. Good selection of drinks and food at the bar. Perfect location, just a very short walk from shops, restaurants, bars and the most gorgeous little beach.  The apartments had been done up since last year and I…

title: taffys break
review: we went 19th sept for a week had a fab time everyone friendly lovely appartments and pool area and near the beach if you walk down steps by stage few mins will bring you straight onto the beach there are loads of bars and restaurants and we seen some good singers there is also entertainment every night in the appartments the hollywood bar next to the appartments was good lindleys was great dugans irish pub had some great bands the cocktail bars have parrots in them and the owner comes round and puts them on your head if you want all a bit of fun hadnt been to calador before but will def be returning

title: Generally very good
review: Booked 2 1 bedroom apartments, 1 for 3 adults and 1 for 2 adults. Requested rooms next to each other on a higher floor, got 1 in block 6 on the first floor and 1 in block 4 ground floor!! not really a problem. Both apartments generally good, myself, husband and daughter in block 4 had an "upgraded" apartment, slightly bigger and a bit more modern than my parents apartment in block 6, but on the whole not much different. Air con seemed to be available 24/7 which was great at no extra cost, balconies were big! One bit of advice though, if you want to hang clothes up, take hangers, both apartments had 2 hangers per person !!! I don't class myself as fussy when it comes to basic holiday accommodation (many, many years travelling to Greece!) but 2 hangers per person and no drawers or…

title: Best holiday ever!!
review: We went to ravells apartments on 1st of september for a week with our 2 children. The staff very excellent and couldnt do enough for us especially Dani the childrens entertainer. My kids loved her!! The food and drinks were lovely and the entertainment were great especially take that and michael jackson. Will be returning next year!

title: Superb Holiday
review: Once again a superb holiday with many thanks to all the staff at ola es ravells.  We are always treated in a fantastic way from the minute we walk in reception to check in  2015 we will return   Thank you Maru and all your wonderful staff

title: Cheap getaway
review: Stayed here for a long weekend. Rooms were spacious good size balcony kitchen OK but didn't use except the fridge. Bathroom nice and clean. Great for what we paid. Pool area was excellent plenty of beds and pool was lovely. Cocktails were sometimes good but avoid frozen style at all costs! Food basic but ok. Good location for the quiet resort. Entertainment was OK what we saw of it. Drinks expensive! Also we were woken by a cockrel every morning at 6am.....

title: Fabulous location
review: Travelled 31st Aug.. Es Ravells is situated very central with plenty of bars and restaurants near by.  We had a one bedroom apartment for the 2 of us but the lounge would be a squeeze if 4 adults. However, some vary in size and looked like may have been bigger than ours. Basic but very clean and tidy and looked like the bathroom had been refurbished. Kitchen facilities are basic and if planning to cook may be a problem. Maid service excellent...Pool lovely and clean.   Evening entertainment was very good apart from the Elvis tribute......Kids entertainment girl was very friendly.... We were in block 7 room 701. This had a huge balcony and was directly over looking the outside stage, excellent view to watch the entertainment .  Weather hot, 28 degrees @ 9pm.., which was lovely to…

title: another fantastic holiday at ola ravells
review: (Lynda..mary and ashley) another fantastic holiday ..Very clean hotel..room was made up every other day with fresh towels ..staff and bar staff were very friendly ..air con not fantastic but was adequate ...Great value for money ..pool very clean lots of friendly people ..Great entertainer with daily polo games and quizzes round the pool ...definitely will be returning next year ..

title: Great facilities- great value and location
review: family of four stayed in Late July / early August 2014 - placed in block 7 with good view of pool and late night stage entertainment. In this block I agree things do go quiet at midnight but if need quieter rooms then younger families should  request the other blocks. I was a bit worried about comments of air con but it is on enough to give cool rooms without the need for extra charges!! - a bonus. The pool is excellent with enough shady sunbeds and the location for central cala d'or is perfect .All hotel staff ( especially hunky paco) were very friendly and helpful. Would definitely re- book.

title: Fantanstic 2nd Visit
review: Returned to Es Ravells with my daughter for the 2nd year this time our arrival was a lot quicker last year it had taken us about 3.5 hours to get to Es Ravells so was pleased that we didnt seem to drop at so many places.  We were greeted at reception by one of the lovely staff and were advised that we have been upgraded from a Studio to a 1 bed aparrtment free of charge, which was really nice. Our apartment was in block 6 very clean and tidy and as it was an end apartment the balcony was absolutely huge.  Ravells is ideally situated for everything, bars, restaurants, shops. I read again reviews before going and the Hollywood Bar and block 7 is still being mentioned I can only speak from our experience and I appreicate we werent in block 7 but having walked past the bar at…

title: More than I could have hoped for!
review: for the price, I wasn't expected anything special. But during my stay in August 2014 I was pleasantly surprised by how big and nice the room and balcony was, and the general facilities of the Hotel. The pool was very well maintained (although could be open later into the evening) and there were always plenty of sun loungers.

title: fan bloody tastic
review: stayed here from 11/8/14 until 21/11/14 in the so called dreaded block 7.....don't no what all the fuss is about all go's quiet at midnight. rooms a good size if but basic but its all you need as there is plenty to do in cala d'or  hotel staff (maru and paco) where very nice and could not do enough for us throughout our stay. pool great,tropical gardens bar great overall a great family hotel.our hotel room was 7301 this had a added bonus off a huge and I mean huge balcony/terrace. don't be put off by some reviews about block 7 its not that bad

title: Wonderful!
review: Just returned from our third year at these apartments.  They are in a great central location.  The apartment is cleaned every other day. There is a toaster,  kettle, crockery etc all you need for basic self catering.  The pool area is lovely with  plenty of sunbeds.  Maru, Paco and the rest of the team are so friendly, helpful and efficient.  We look forward to going back in 2015.

title: Ms webster
review: Overall a nice place but missing a few touches. Cleaning of appartment could have been better and the utensils .had a enjoyable week thou .cracking weather and the pool is very nice just what u need cool down in .

title: great location nice resort
review: For the price we paid , we have no complaints. Family of three(12 year old daughter), A bit of a squeeze fitting in the third fold up bed, but I thought the sofa beds were surprisingly comfortable , the studio was very small , but we got used to it. We had a ground floor studio room in block 6. Nice large bathroom and adequate balcony. Air con in this block was controlled from the room so had it on 24/7. It was quiet and worked perfectly. Entertainment could be a little loud if you are early to bed, but all done by 12.00. plenty of local shops if you want to do a little self catering , but be prepared to eat out as well , our room had no microwave or oven, but it did have two hob rings, a kettle and toaster. do not miss the adjac ent ice cream parlour (across the bridge to your…

title: Enjoyable family holiday
review: Overall a pleasant place, location is excellent at the centre of shops, bars, restaurants, no need for any taxis and walking distance to 3 different beaches all absolutely breathtaking and clean with aqua water for snorkeling.Rooms at Es Ravell's pretty basic, maybe a little small as we have 2 kids ( 16&14) but clean, we mentioned this to the hotel manager Maru, lovely, lovely lady but stated as it was peak there were no rooms available until following week, we decided to stay put, but she couldn't do enough for us when requested, always gave us a wave and said hello remembering our first names which makes it more personal, top marks. We stayed in block 7!!!!! By Hollywood bar, overlooking pool, karaoke from bar in the evening didn't bother us as we went out into Cala D'Or by…

title: excellent holiday
review: We stayed in for 9 nights at the end of July/beginning of August it was fabulous Paco and Maru are wonderful people and made us feel completely at home , even lending us a wheelchair as l was recovering from surgery. We had a one bedroomed apartment which was spacious and clean with the maids coming in every second day.. Nothing was too much trouble for any member of staff, we have already booked to go back next year and can't wait. We just like to say a special thank you to Maru  you are brilliant.

title: Just got back from VERY enjoyable 7 nights
review: This is a great choice for families. The rooms are pretty basic but all have clean modern bathrooms and nice balconies - most overlook the pool. The location is fantastic. The beaches, town centre, bars and restaurants are all within a few minutes walk. Unlike most hotels, the bar area (tropical garden) is open to the public and so is normally busy with a good atmosphere. Most of the acts that we saw were good... And if they aren't to your taste the Hollywood bar next door is busy and has entertainment every night. The staff are great. The receptionists we very helpful trying to sort out a problem we had with our transfer. The bar staff are great - make the effort to get to know them and they will really look after you. A lot of people moan about the pool closing at 6.30pm which…

title: ok could be better
review: Hotel/rooms were very clean food was good , entertainment was ok. Thought all the staff bar  one or two could do with a bit more personality. The main problem with these apartment was the rules sometimes i felt like i was still at school, no food or drink down by the pool unless it was brought from their bar/restaurant which wasn't cheap, also everyday at 6.20pm you got a 10min warning that the pool area had to be cleared never known this before, even the reception didn't agree with this rule as when i question it he answered if it was him on holiday he would want to be at the poolside till at least 8pm ive been abroad quite a bit i like to leave the pool when i want and if im self-catering eat and drink were i like and don't feel like im doing something wrong. i appreciate it…

title: lovely apartments
review: Just back from 10 night stay, appts newly refurbished very clean maids an reception staff all very hard working and friendly. Good central area my only problem was the pool being so far away as we were in block 4 no good if you have children as you have to walk about 100 yards to main building and also the nightly tribute bands weren't for us but it each to his own it all stopped at 12pm so not to bad. All in all a lovely place to stay .

title: Very happy to recommend
review: Spent a week in these apartments and I was very satisfied with our choice. I was in a one bedroom apartment in Block 7 directly overlooking the pool and the stage from where there was nightly entertainment. The apartment was very clean and met our needs.  The bathroom was a little small in my opinion but apart from that we had no complaints at all. I enjoyed sitting out on the large veranda in the evening and watching and listening to the entertainment below. The music stopped at 12am and noise was not an issue at all.  These apartments are in a superb location, just a couple of minutes walk away from Cala D'or town centre. Everything a tourist could want is virtually on their doorstep.  I would have no hesitation in recommending Es Ravells D'or apartments to others.

title: Sold under false pretences
review: Stayed 8 days, 2 weeks ago and had booked - and to quote the accommodation voucher - a one bed roomed apartment with air conditioning. Guy on reception initially tried to send us to a studio and even after I told him that's not what we booked, he insisted he was right. Good job I had a spare copy of the voucher he now possessed to prove the point. Apartment was fine, as described and I would have scored it 4/5 except - no air conditioning. Went to reception after our first restless night of limited sleep as it was too hot, to advise the air con wasn't working, the guy explained it was working but management policy was that it was only switched on between 3pm to 8pm - not much use when you're out all day til 7 by the pool/ beach, but useful if you're indoors all day like…

title: Great Value
review: Sorry for the inconveniences. We always try to give our bests to our clients. The air con is not working the 24h as it is informed in our web description, the timetables change during the season, depending of the weather. We are really sorry if it was not to your liking. We work hard to improve our service and solve guests complain to give them the bests holidays in the Ola Apartments Es Ravells D’Or.

title: paula& chris
review: Just returned after a 2 week break with my girlfriend at Ola Es Ravells. We arrived late on but the staff where very friendly and helpful, We were in room 303 in the "dreaded" block 7 and had no problems at all, apartments look to have recently been painted and look good for it. Nice view of the pool area/tropical gardens and stage, The apartment was cleaned every 2nd day with fresh bedding/towels which was fine. The tv had mainly dutch/german channels, the only 2 English ones where just news stations.  Usually managed to get a sunbed however it started getting a lot busier towards the end of our second week and the pool isn't the largest so we started going to the beach as the pool felt a bit crowded at times.   I'd seen some reviews about noise and although we were in block 7…

title: Excellent apartment, price to match!
review: A big thanks to Maru for another great holiday, Es Ravells is like our second home now,we love going there on holiday cala dor is a beautiful place and the bar staff at tropical gardens are great people I would recommend holiday makers to try Es Ravells  they will not be disappointed we have been to cala dor several times, all our times we have stayed at es ravells and have enjoyed every time and cannot fault it from Maru to the cleaners the apartments are cleaned on a regular basis and are ideal for couples or a small family there is live entertainment on nightly with tribute acts and also childrens entertainment before the live entertainment there is a bar on the complex aswell called the tropical gardens great bar staff who go out there way a big thanks to them especially…

title: Relaxing holiday
review: Me and my partner have just come back and can't wait to go again, highly recommended. The staff are lovely and the rooms are clean. When we arrived to the hotel we was up graded free of charge! If you are looking for a cheap hotel I would highly recommend

title: Lovely Holiday!
review: Myself and my fiancé had a fantastic stay at Es Ravells! It was my fiancé's first visit to cala do and thanks in part to this hotel, he can't wait to go back!  The rooms are basic but very clean and the bathrooms look to have been modernised quite recently. We stayed in a self catering studio which was plenty of room for the two of us. We had a lovely balcony area which got the sun later in the day - perfect for drinks before heading out for dinner!  The pool are of the hotel is lovely. Pool is very clean and as we went before the summer holidays there were plenty of sunbeds for everyone. We didn't have a problem with anyone reserving sunbeds with towels and always managed to get a good spot! The pool was quite cold but we were there at the end of May so it hadn't had much of a…

title: Great Week at Es Ravells..!!
review: Had a really great week here May 17 - 24, was quite happy seeing our room with this massive balcony and thought great..!! My daughter's and boyfriend had room 7102 and my wife, son and I had 7101 the fun kicked in when we went to bed.....we were right above the worst and loudest Karaoke bar in Cala D Or. Didn't cause us much problem really we did sleep eventually but don't go to bed before 1am..you will suffer this horrendous noise. Apart from that no problem. Staff really nice, pool very cold but we still went in there loads. Pool bar and food very good a little expensive but can't complain really. Plenty of sunbeds I know it wasn't peak and probably different when busy. Danni the animations rep try's very hard to get people doing things but easier said than done getting…

title: Disappointing
review: When we arrived we were told that our room was not ready and had to spend the night in another hotel! If only we could have stayed there for the rest of the trip as our room at Es Ravells was very basic, unclean and had shutters and bolts on the doors, which made us feel aware of our safety. Although we were given an 'upgrade', I don't believe that this was a positive outcome as the upgraded room was below average. Cala Dor was slightly less disappointing as the beaches were beautiful but were quite crowded. The general area had lots of shops and restaurants and a lovely harbour that I would advise visiting. Overall, we were disappointed by the hotel but enjoyed our stay in Majorca. It may be worth noting that Cala Dor seemed a popular resort for German tourists rather than…

title: pretty good
review: We are sorry not to have fulfilled your expectations with your accommodation at Ola Apartamentos Es Ravells D'Or.

title: Lovely Holiday
review: Just spent the last week at this hotel, good location, lovely pool, good entertainment, great ice cream parlour next door and plenty of lovely restaurants to eat.  Only one issue we had was the air conditioning did not work, when we asked at reception he said it was "too hot" to work? It was a shame as the apartment was boiling especially at night.  All in all though we had a lovely time and would go back again.

title: Great hotel
review: Thank you for taking the time to review the Ola Apartamentos Es Ravells D'Or, and for your confidence in our service.

title: A nice hotel
review: Just got back from a 7 night stay at this hotel and overall I thought the hotel was brilliant.  The rooms were clean and spacious, beds were not to uncomfy either and it had a decent sized balcony.  The pool area was kept nice and clean and we didn't have a problem getting a sun bed. The food at the pool bar was very nice too.  The entertainment brought in a lot of people to the hotel on an evening the acts were mainly older groups but still had a good atmosphere.  The hotel itself is very near to the centre within easy walking distance to all the restaurants shops etc. We did however find the supermarkets very expensive and to be honest even the bars were not cheap, you wouldn't get a vodka coke cheaper than 5 or 6 pounds.  The beach was very nice but still rather crowded to…

title: Ola Es Ravells
review: Thank you for your review, and your confidence in our service.

title: paula&chris liverpool
review: We stayed at Ola Apartamentos Es Ravells D'or during late September booking through Travel Republic. On arrival we were told that our room was unavailable and that we would need to spend the first night of our holiday in another hotel. The hotel would pay for the taxi to the new hotel, throw in a breakfast and upgrade us to an apartment on our return. Not the best thing to hear but we decided to go with it and accept the deal.  On our return we were happy with the apartment and got on with our holiday...  THE ROOM The apartment we stayed in was a good size with bedroom, bathroom, kitchen area, living room/dinner area and balcony. The decor and fixtures were a little outdated but not as much to cause any issue. The bedroom has the standard 2 single beds pushed together to form…

title: A good recommendation...
review: I just came back from a 6 night stay here and I am very pleased by this holiday. The reception was open 24/7 which came in use for getting directions as Cala d'or is a maze. We were two people in a studio flat which gave us plenty of space. Wed the basics; a stove, fridge, towels, kettle and toaster. As well as a tv (which did not work) and a balcony. The cleaners came to change towels almost every day, and which, despite not speaking much english, were very friendly. We didnt eat at the restauraunt but had quite a few drinks there, by which, despite being simple, were good price for value. The entertainment was...interesting (although it only really started getting good once youve downed a few drinks) and most of the entertainers were english origin. Everyone was super friendly…

title: Excellent
review: Thank you for your review. We are very happy you enjoyed your holiday at our apartments. We hope to see you next year again.

title: Ola Es Ravells D'or
review: We have just returned from an 11 night self catering holiday and I must say we could not fault these apartments. We stayed in a studio, which was basic (to be expected) but had a kettle and toaster (bonus). The bar staff were great and we had a few laughs, the cleaners were thorough and our linen/towels were changed regularly, we had an issue with the kettle but a call to reception and this was resolved within minutes. The reception staff were also very pleasant and helpful. The apartments are in a great location, with bars/restaurants on the doorstep and the beach is a few minutes walk away. We didn't find it difficult to get a sunbed by the pool, even though it was usually mid-morning before we surfaced. All in all a great holiday and will certainly return and would recommend…

title: Block 7: Abba tribute nights: Good Times
review: Thank you for your review. We are very happy you enjoyed your stay at our hotel. We will pass on your review to all hotel staff in order to motivate them for future guests. We hope to welcome you back next year at our apartment.

title: Apartments are great - pity they didn't heed our request for quiet location!
review: These apartments are excellent standard for the price. We usually stay in the Studio for 3 adults. We have a balcony overlooking the pool and the night entertainment. There is also a balcony on the side too. The Manageress Maru is very friendly and goes out of her way to see that you are enjoying your holiday. The reception staff and cleaning staff  are friendly too and cant help enough. If you ever need anything at all just ask the staff and they will do their very best for you.  We have visited the Apartments on 5 occasions and have booked already for next year. The Pool attendant does a very good job too in keeping the pool clean daily and tests the water during the day too. The food in the Tropical Garden bar is good too. Tony and his staff work very hard day and night.…

title: First Class Apartments ... as usual!!
review: We have just returned from our second trip to Cala D'or staying at Ola Es Ravells apartments.  These apartments are fantastic, they are in a great location and have everything you need for a great holiday.  The apartment was clean, comfortable and spacious.  They have been redecorated since last year with the addition of a kettle and toaster. The beds are comfy, the air-con good and the bathroom was a good size, with great pressure in the shower, bedding and towels were changed every other day.  The reception staff are so friendly and helpful especially our special friend Ramiro who looked after us so well prior to our visit, although unfortunately we only saw him on our final day.  The pool area is kept lovely and clean and you can pretty much always get a sunbed.  The nightly…

title: Great value
review: Thank you for your review. We are very happy you enjoyed your second stay at our apartments so much. We are happy you noticed the improvements we made this year to our apartments. We will certainly pass on your compliments to Mike and Ramiro to motivate them to keep giving excellent service to future guests and their children. We will warmly welcome you back, next year at our apartments for the third time in a row.

title: Nice Apartment but quite Noisey
review: Just returned from a week here and it was excellent.On arrival reception staff could not be more helpful.The room was clean,The pool was great as was the entertainment.We wandered around a bit but found the best food was actually at the hotel itself,And having a 10 yr old with us we were able to return to the room around 10 pm but still have a great view of the entertainment from the Appartments balcony.I would go here again without hesitation.Fantastic

title: Fantastic Holiday
review: Thank you for your opinion. We are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us so much. We hope to see you next year again in our apartments.

title: Self cater holiday
review: Visited in July and found the apartment very clean and a good size. There is a great pool and bar downstairs also with some good live entertainment each night. The apartment staff are very friendly but the guys on the bar downstairs seemed quite grumpy and did not seem to be that friendly. Apartment is in a great location just 2 mins from the lovely nearby beach. Be warned though if you are looking for a quiet holiday this may not be the place for you as the nightly entertainment goes on late and there is a nearby Karaoke bar which stays open till 3am which we found quite a pain as we had asked for a quiet place when we book our holiday. On the whole this is a very nice place to stay but just be warned of the noise at nights.

title: Decent 3* apart hotel, does what it says on the label.
review: Perfectly adequate apart hotel, just what we were looking for.  Good pool, friendly staff and a short walk to bars and restaurants. Two gripes: pool closes at 6.30 and it could really do with a refurb, though based on what we paid (through booking.com) not a big issue. PS the chickens that roam the grounds are good entertainment.

title: Great holiday
review: Thank you for your review. We are happy you enjoyed your stay with us. The pool closes at 18:30 because we need to clear away the sunbeds and put tables for the evening entertainment,.  We hope to welcome you next year again in our apartements.

title: Could not recommend more, amazing holiday with friends!
review: I'm still here now!!!  after reading a few rubbish reviews I don't understand what they were complaining about! It's basic but it's very clean the staff are friendly and the animation girl Amber try's really hard! The pool is great and the menu choice at the pool bar is fantastic the evening entertainment was great Gary Barlow was fab!! Shame it wasn't him himself!!!  Lots of gift shops and near to lots of restaurants I would recommend the taste of Texas ! Beach is close but gets packed ! A bit noisy at night by the Hollywood bar but it doesn't effect all the rooms ! Overall I'm glad we chose es ravells and would come again !

title: great stay, the most helpful staff ever!
review: Thank you for your review. We are happy you enjoyed your stay at our apartments. We will pass on your compliments to amber to motivate her for future clients. We hope to welcome you next year again.

title: The night receptionist MIGUEL is so good !! So helpful :)))))  really liked it.
review: Me and a group of 5 friends just returned from a week holiday at Es Ravells. We had such a lovely time and really cannot rate the hotel any higher, especially not for the budget price! We had two apartments which were large and comfortable and cleaned every other day with new towels. We had a huge balcony in one of the apartments (Room 7201 I think) which was perfect for drinks before dinner and we wished we could have had a BBQ! In terms of self catering the apartment had a fridge, kettle and toaster and two hob rings for cooking. We ate out every night so didn’t use the hob but it probably would limit guests in terms of what they can cook but like I said it didn’t affect us at all. There are loads of supermarkets nearby and it’s a good idea to buy 5 litre bottles of water…

title: Ola-la
review: The apartment [Block 7] had good things going for it. Spacious, clean, good refrigerator, not so sure about 'cosy'. 'Electric cooker' means two hot plates. Adequate clean bathroom. Fine SW facing balcony. Sad reflection on modern guests. Management need to hire out safe deposit boxes and TV zappers. We are not so sure that swimming pool is 'huge', but is does have a faux Roman aqueduct.. Central location for town based activities. [The Cala D'or Jazz Festival was great fun.] Do find the garden pathway to Cala Gran. Food shopping is fine. Note that not all SPAR shops sell at the same prices. Now the bad news is the nightly programme of entertainment. If being caught between Lady Gaga tributes and karaoke from next door Bar Hollywood till midnight, do it.  Otherwise ........

title: Great aprtment, great place to stay
review: We stayed at the Ravells D’Or (Block 7 Room 302, I bed apartment) for a week  during the end of May 2013, and overall we were very pleasantly surprised considering this is budget accommodation, upon arrival at 01:00 our room was ready and very clean, and included a kettle and toaster, everything worked, there were two sofa beds, plus two single beds, and we had  a decent view of the pool complex, beds and towels were fine, maid service every other day, the only thing missing was an oven, so could not cook chips or pizza, but no big deal as plenty of restaurants in Cala D’Or. The Hotel tries hard to provide entertainment every other night, which is ok, and the shows usually finish by 23:30, we did not hear much noise, but depends on what block you are in, also no music is played…

title: nice complex shame about the noise
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our apartments, we are very happy you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to welcome you next year again

title: perfect self catering destination
review: we arrived at stupid o clock to find the staff at the reception very smiley and helpful,,found our room on the first floor it was quite spacious and had three balconies, twin beds which were very comfortable,nice bathroom and a sufficient kitchenette with fridge toaster and kettle.The décor was a bit scruffy and dated but it was clean enough.The only problem was..the noise..we were told we had  quiet room-I think what the man meant was "away from the bar" but what he didn't tell us was we were on the main road where all the lorries rumble past at 6am after delivering to the bars and its also on the main bus route..they also empty the bins about 7am and you can still hear the bar music which stops at midnight.Apart from that we had  great time, not too far to wait for amenities,…

title: fab hotel fab location fab friendly staff
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our apartments,

title: great apartments & great location
review: me and my partner stayed in these apartments a few years ago, we really enjoyed it. the apartments were spotless, food in the snack bar was lovely and reasonably priced as were the drinks. as for the location you couldnt ask for better shops, restaurants and bars just outside the complex and a short walk away from the main town and square. the only down side to our holiday was that the week we went was the worst weeks weather spain had in a long time, rain, thunder & lightening for a 2 days then rain the rest, we would love to return to this complex as we feel we never got to see much of the resort because of the weather. would definatly recommend this place.

title: Fantastic Bargain and lovely people
review: Booked this 2 weeks ago. I have to say, for the price I feel we have had a fantastic bargain. As soon as we walked into the place, we were greeted with a smile and a friendly hello. Then, probably because they are not too busy, we were given a free upgrade from a studio room to an apartment. Is is equipped with everything we feel we need for a good holiday. Of course, it is basic, but as we spend all day out, we dont need anymore than basic. It is very. Clean, everything works as we would want it to. The beds are a bit hard but not uncomfortable, if you like a soft mattress, then maybe its not for you. Its everything I look for in a cheap room. 109 pounds for 5 nights, with entertainment right outside your window

title: Sum job!!!
review: Thank you for taking the time and the effort to write a review, we are very happy that you enjoyed your stay. We are also happy that you find the given service very good, we value this a lot in Ola Hotels. About the matrass being hard, this is because they are new, this year we bought new matrasses, so this is maybe why they appeared hard to you, so more clients have to sleep on them to get softer :).

title: OK accommodation but GET A SAFE!
review: I stayed here in august 2012. Once we arrived at the hotel we were greeted by some of the friendliest staff you could ever meet I forget their names and they showed us to our room and I was quiet surprised that it was pretty well kept but there was only one thing that I didnt like was that although the sheets and all were cleaned I think if they just took a little extra time te clean them I would make a big difference. After reading other comments about the noise I myself didn't find this annoying I always had a good sleep. The pool is clean and the staff down at the tropical gardens are absolute legend first class service and the food was also great.  Keep it up lads !!!!!!!!!!!

title: lenny 2012 sept (liverpool)
review: Stayed here in Summer 2012. As many others have said, these are basic apartments but have what you need. We enjoyed some of the entertainment but did have to plan strategically to be out at certain times some nights to avoid the tribute acts murdering some of my favourites!  My main gripe is that we had our phones and money stolen from our apartment during our stay. I know, I know, we should have got a safe, but they were well hidden so this was not an opportunisitc theft but a good rifling through all our things in wardrobes and drawers. For a number of reasons we know it was the maid (this is NOT me being judgemental, there was concrete evidence). Reported it etc, the manager gave us great lip service, but then wouldn't let us use the hotel phone to call our UK mobile…

title: Last night in es ravelles - excellent budget hotel.
review: All packed ready to leave but would definatly come back.Our room 7301 had a massive balcony secluded bathing sun up to sun down all day.Down side above the hollywood bar - not complaining about the noise but the quality of the karoke singers !!!Location is excelent for shops bars beaches. cannot fault Cala d'or on all counts.

title: Great budget apartment!!
review: My wife and I came here last minute for a cheap long weekend break because it works out more value for money than Cornwall! Don't know what people are moaning about. The location couldn't be better, the staff are lovely and the studio we had was clean but basic. Yes there is music nightly and it's cheesy but if you want something first class and silent, hire an expensive villa in Deia!!!!! Why you need a tv, kettle, microwave or toaster on holiday is beyond me - there are hobs/pans provided with crockery and cutlery. Those moaners should simply stay at home. Experienced travellers my butt! You get what you pay for.

title: No sleep for a week!
review: Stayed here for a sleepless week in early Sept 2012.  If you're a party animal its fine, no one sleeps here at night, domestics on the verandas till 4am & 5am, neighbours unable to unlock their door at 2.30am, shouting, banging and crashing about outside our room.  VERY loud entertainment at Tropical Gardens every night. Very loud Karaoke at Hollywood bar every night, including some sort of brawl on night 2 in the early hours. We did hire tv remote to try to drown out the overpowering noise from all directions.  We stayed in 7105, with very small awkward bathroom.  No Kettle or toaster. Beds are memory foam and get very hot & uncomfortable. During the day we found that the staff at Tropical gardens had given up, as the seasons end approached and we were left waiting for our…

title: Great location
review: Just got back from one week at es ravelles which is right in the heart of this beautiful resort. there are bars and eateries right on the doorstep so we didnt bother trying to do any meals in the room,we just went down and had breakfast by the pool a full english with toast and tea for 5 euros great value.The entertainment was mostly tribute acts so we saw Michael Jackson (so so) Lady Ga Ga  & Amy Winehouse with two of the best backing dancers you will ever see,and the best Beatles act I have seen they were really great. Ok the room wasn't great but we had a nice view of the pool and for a resonable price you get what you pay for.

title: First impression was awful....
review: When myself and my fiance arrived we were shocked at the room we had been allocated...terrible shabby studio (not what we paid for by all means), maintenance man was doing the electrics, it was dark and dreary, no view after asking for one (basement with dirt and trees outside) We then had to pay 140 euros to upgrade to a room with a view, it wasn't much better but we thought it would do!! Were not treated well at all after complaining (although he then gave us a free kettle rather than charging us 12 euros for our problems) We then went to room 7203.The noise was fine, after all on holiday your not tucked up in bed before midnight really...We had friends in a much better hotel just behind ours so spent most of our time up there with them...the location is great but after being…

title: Wouldn't Go Back
review: Situated in a nice area of Cala D'or, close to the many resturants & shops this resport has to offer. On arrival we were greated by a very friendly & helpful receptionist, ( forgot to ask her name ), and nothing was to much trouble for her. On entering our room, which was a 1 bed appartment we thought it looked rather shabby & tired. No kettle, microwave or toaster ( all available  as extras ). 2 single beds which were hard and rather dirty, with badly stained mattress covers. Paid 2 euros a day to hire a remote control for TV. Wish I hadn't bothered as the only english programmes were BBC news & CNN. The worst  thing about Es Ravells is the noise though, Bingo from noon until 3pm (yawn) then in the evening a kids disco & so called singers who are on until midnight (7 days a…

title: Just Right!
review: Just returned from a week long stay here... we didnt know what to expect before getting there, and its always hard to know from tripadvisor, as people are either going to moan or complement on the little things...   Overall.. this place could not have suited us better.. We had a large apartment, with a very large sun terrace that wrapped around our apartment, very friendly staff from reception to cleaners.... clean pool.... nice gardens.... also, just two minutes to restaurants, shops and a great cala! without feeling you are in the middle of things...  The entertainment can be noisy, but if you stay out a little later or go down and have a drink, you wont be annoyed or even notice it, as it stops at 12 and as cheesy as it may be.. its a little laugh... If this is your only…

title: Good time !
review: I booked the apartments based on the majority of positive reviews on trip advisor - I was nervous before arrival but was more than happy by the time we departed. Was really concerned when block 6 was allocated to us - not a problem, noise - yes until 0015 (we are on holiday so evenings went beyond this time). Would point out if you get 7103 or 7104 then I hope you like a late night out ! As before mentioned - the Hollywood Karaoke bar is directly underneath and is roudy but really good fun if that's your bag. back to Ravells's - I have never met a nicer bunch of hotel and bar staff in all the travelling I have done - special mention to the receptionist "Rameros" and "Paco" who were so helpful. Tony in the tropical garden is a legend and every one of his staff are totally bought…

title: Poor Hotel. Great Location
review: My fiance and I are off travelling around the world for our honeymoon in January. This was supposed to be our last holiday before then that we didn't need to worry about the accommodation, it turned out to be more of a preparation for what to expect in some of the less developed stops on our travels.  Good: + Situated in Cala D'or where there's a lot to do. + Relaxed atmosphere poolside in the daytime.  Bad: - It's really not clean. - Outdated. - Pressure to buy things if you're poolside in the evening. - Little effort to fix pretty major things like water and electricity mixing.  Overview: On arrival we were told that toasters, microwaves and kettles were available to rent during our stay, not a cost you'd expect to fork out for on a self-catering booking (Rooms do include a…

title: A Wee Gem!
review: Just came home last weekend - this was our first time to Cala D'or and we were really looking forward to it .... we were not disappointed.   On arrival at Es Ravells D'or we were greeted by a very friendly receptionist, who was very efficient and informative.  We went to our room, which had everything we needed - clean comfortable beds, a clean bathroom with good pressure in the shower, air-conditioning and a fridge!  Having read reviews on Trip Advisor I was aware of rental charges for kitchen equipment therefore I brought my own kettle! The Ola Es Ravells apartments are in a fantastic location, there's a supermarket across the street if you need it and it's just downhill to Cala Gran beach which is beautiful (3 sunbeds and an umbrella 17.50euro) and really close to the lovely…

title: Should not be promoted as self catering!
review: I have been on many holidays, many of which have been self actering, but I have never had to hire a kettle, toaster and microwave in a self catering apartment!!! They are described as well equiped, tis could not be further from thr truth. Exactly 3 of everything and by that I mean the basic of the basics. No such luxary of any cookiong utensils, sieve etc How anyonw can self cater in there is beyond me. On arrival was put in a one bedroomed apartment as our studiowas not ready. I was informed that this would be at no extra cost to me. I am so pleased! It was the most depressing place I have every slept. I was dreading moving to the  studio the next day as I had never stayed in one before and thought it would compare badly to the room I was leaving. It turned out to be a better…

title: Great Location - Nice Apartments
review: Just back from these apartments, i found them basic but clean with a lovely big bathroom, they need to cut down some of the trees which block the sun from some balconys.  Entertainment on every nite. The staff are all friendly and there was no problem getting extra towels or sheets.  We'd ants on the first day but reception gave me a spray and i didn't see anymore for rest of my stay.  There was no problem getting a sunbed in the mornings, i used to go down between 8.30 - 8.45 to reserve a bed.  Although there a loads of seats if your really stuck.  The rule of "no food or drinks from your apartment around pool" is not really enforced so i wouldn't let this put you off from previous reviews. Apartments are just short walk to main eating places with too many to choose from, lots…

title: Nice apartments for a good price!
review: Es Ravells is located in the centre of Cala D'or. The service is good, the apartment's are clean. It's 200 meter from Cala Gran, the largest beach in Cala D'or. You also must try the beach at Cala Mondrago. It's about 20 minutes from Cala D'or. In the centre you can find lots of restaurant, there's something for everybody's taste.

title: Excellent location and great value
review: Arrived 17th July 2012, for one week .  Apartments are clean, spacious and in such an excellent location.  Loved the pool and the meals around the pool are surprisingly decent quality.   You are literally 5 minutes walk from Cala Gran beach, we preferred Cala Esmerelwhich was about 15 minutes away but all of the beaches are idyllic.   Air conditioning is free - good point.  Would very happily return.    Minor points of irritation - no kettles in room, instead the hotel wants to rent you one for 12 euro.  We just boiled our water for coffee in a pot.  If you do not like the entertainment you have to put up with it until midnight, in saying that, most of it was decent.

title: Great stay
review: Just returned from a 7 night stay in a 1 bed apartment here.  Apartment was reasonably priced and was of a good size for 2 adults and a teenager.  Towels were changed approx every other day and the apartment was adequately cleaned.  We were lucky enough to have a balcony facing the bar and stage area where a different tribute act took place each night - saw Abba, Lady Gaga/Amy Winehouse, Michael Buble, Beatles etc.  Pool area was kept clean and we never found any difficulty getting sunbeds.  Plenty of restaurants in Cala D'or to choose from - we enjoyed Fernandos in particular.  Would recommend these apartments as great location, great entertainment and great value for money.

title: basic
review: i stayed here last year in september for a quiet relaxing week,QUIET is the word it was dead most places had shut cause of the time of year i found there was not much to do of a night maybe because of the time of year am not sure.the hotel was clean but the layout was a bit topsey turvey 2 settees that converted into beds couldnt even push them together to make a double,other than that complex was ok come 12 midnight that was it went quiet so sleeping was not a problem,staff were friendly,my personnel choice is i wouldnt go back

title: Air con not good...staff excellent
review: I stayed here with my mother from the 23 june to the 27 june.  On arrival we checked in swiftly and efficiently.  We had booked a studio apartment but when we got to the room we were quite shocked to see exactly how small it was.  The beds were two settee's on each side of the living room and were very small.  I went to reception to enquire about paying more for a 1 bedroom apartment and spoke to a lovely man called Ramiro (i may have spelt this wrong)  he informed me they had no apartments available until the next day but he will phone and let me know as soon as he knew something.  Within an hour he had phoned the room and we were told to come back and we will be moved the next day with no extra cost to ourselves.  We had quite an uncomfortable night (the entertainment by the…

title: good relaxing family break
review: we stayed at es ravels in july 2011 ,second visit there.we really like the friendly and welcolming vibe in these appartments.it is cheap and basic but perfectly good.we enjoyed the entertainment at night and the quiet days by the pool.we are going back this year and are looking forward to it.

title: Great clean budget accommodation!
review: Stayed here in June 2011. The rooms are clean and basic, theres some great entertainment at the Tropical Gardens bar and restaurant, nice pool, plenty of loungers. The pool entertainer (Danny when we were there) will keep kids (and adults) happy with games of killer pool, killer darts and various pool games and dancing at the kids disco every night etc. Cala d'or itself is lovely and has lots of nice restaurants nearby, a couple of nice beaches and a beautiful marina. This is more the chilled holiday rather than action packed and super busy which is what we liked. We would stay here again. The only gripe we had was that this is advertised as air conditioned rooms but the management refused to turn it on in june!! lots of people complained but still no air con when we left…

title: cheap and cheerful-basic but great location!
review: I have just returned from Es Ravelle D'Or 17-24th Sept Good: I was given an apartment in block 4 so very quiet-if you have families you should ask for this block.Or if you like more privacy,there were only two rooms on my floor so very quiet! We had an extra large balcony,larger than most which was nice! Good Location to walk everywhere! Although we didnt eat directly near the hotel as found most of the food quite poor in Cala D'or,nicer if you walk further to the marina and not much difference in price!Plus it has a lovely holiday feel there! There doesnt seem to be many places with cheesey nightly entertainment so es revelle is perfect if u like that!I enjoyed Robbie Williams!I walked past while 'Lady Gogo' was on and was very thankful to be in block 4 as she was woeful! Car…

title: Just got back
review: Arrived 17th sept for a week. Rooms are very basic. The couch transforms (Luckily not like the film) into your bed. On the plus side hotel is slap bang in the middle of it.Restaurants,bars etc.The in-house singer at the Hollywood bar thinks shes great. Sadly she wouldnt make it to Boot Camp on the x-factor. A lot of holiday makers complained about the noise so you may need ear plugs. All in all not to bad for a cheeky week away.!!!!

title: Basic apartments but good for entertainment
review: These apartments and studios are quite basic but if you want basic accommodation with loads of entertainment then this is the place for you.  Expect a lot of noise up to midnight but it's so easy to enjoy the acts from the comfort of your balcony that you can't help but get swept up in it all.  I think the apartments were described as having everything you need for a self-catering holiday.  However, nowadays I would expect a kettle, toaster and even microwave to be included without having to hire them from reception when you get there.  The toaster, kettle and microwave were 12 euro extra each for a week and if you want to use the TV then you have to pay 2 euro per day - this adds an extra 100 euro to your bill if you hire them for a two week holiday.  So long as you understand…

title: great holiday
review: we had a great holiday at the Es Ravells, the staff were fantastic and our Apartment was spotless with a first class view of the entertainment off the Balcony, in fact I cannot find anything to complain about and we will definately be going back again next year. S, Hunt

title: Great for families with teens.
review: We booked Es Ravells as a cheap, end of school holiday in the sun for our teenagers and friends. Some of the previous reviews worried me slightly as the holiday approached but I needn't have been concerned. We got exactly what we wanted and we had a good holiday.   Apartments Don't expect luxury -this is a basic apartment with simple cooking facilities that is perfect for a base. The apartments are "refreshed" every other day with towels and a cursory sweep which we found adequate.   Entertainment The entertainment is nightly and noisy but everything goes quiet promptly at midnight. You WILL hear it from the apartment (we were in Block 6), but it is mostly enjoyable and we found that we were up that late anyway, despite being earlyish to bed at home.   Poolside and bar This is…

title: We'd definately go back!!
review: We stayed at Es Ravells D'Or from 24th August till 3rd September. The apartment was basic but what we expected. We also had a problem with ants but it was quickly resolved! The only thing bad about the bedrooms was that there was not enough space for a family of 4 to put all their clothes. Cleaning of apartments could have been to a better standard. Danny Rodgers the entertainer was absolutley brilliant with both kids and adults, what a really lovely person, would love to see him back again. Tony Paco and all the bar staff were very friendly and great fun. The entertainment on a night was great! The location of the apartments are perfect, everything was within 5 minutes walk that is too the beach and the centre, we heard no noise from the HollyWood Bar even though we were in…

title: Wasn't the best, but would return
review: I returned home yesterday. We had a very long day, and when we got to the hotel the man at reception who was a cross between mr bean and faulty towers said that the room had a water problem and that we would be staying in a 4 star hotel around the corner. When we got to the other hotel, it was not a 4 star hotel it was a 1 star, and it was 10 minutes walk from everything. We tried not to let this spoil our holiday, and if there is one thing we love on holiday it is a great pool and it didnt have a great pool. So on the Monday when we got back to Es Ravells, we found out by somebody who is staying in the hotel that our room was over-booked. When we got to the room, we was infested with ants, ants everywhere, so we got out insect spray and sprayed the ones inside the appartment…

title: lovely cala d'or - es ravells - so so
review: arrived 6am to be told there was no room for us as there had been a crash and rooms were booked. moved us to cala egos (10minsintaxi) for 2 nights. cala egos was surprisingly lovely but small. told to be in reception after breakfast on sunday morning. taxi took us back to es ravells. receptionist told us room wasnt ready - problem with water. asked her for room number which she gave us. entered room at 2pm and guests next door told us that the previous guests from our apart left an hour ago. settled in to our basic but clean apart. (tip) air con isnt the best but cala d'or is breezy so open all doors and windows to create vacuum! went back and asked for manager. demanded refund for first 2 days. she would not give it but offered free full breakfast for the 4 of us for rest of…

title: Good location - very noisy
review: We spent 2 weeks at Es Ravells. We stayed in block 6 which is directly over the pool area. Firstly, the pool area is owned by the bar not the hotel. That out of the way the pool area is where all the entertainment is shown. There is entertainment very night, starting with a kids disco then the adults entertainment. These were very bad tribute acts - in our opinion. The acts were on a weekly rota so you saw the same act twice. Not only that some entertainers did 2 different covers but used the same jokes. We saw some of the entertainment during the first week but our aim was to go out every night. The entertainment finished at 12. Once the entertainment had finished the staff around the pool bar set up the sunbeds for the morning and cleared the bar. This could take up to an hour…

title: In need of urgent refurb!
review: We stayed here from 31.07.11 - 10.08.11 and had booked 2 rooms. Upon check in, only one room was available. We had to leave 2 of our party in the available room and we had to stay at another hotel for that night and to return the next day when they would have a room available for us. The guy on reception briefly gave us directions to the hotel and then left us to it to find it!!! This involved walking around with our elderly mother, plus bags for at least an hour before we located the hotel we had been given. Not quite the start of our holiday we had hoped for! The next morning, we headed for Els Ravells but were informed when we got there that our room was still not available and it was several hours later before it was, Sara on reception didn't seem to care! Bad Points: 1. Air…

title: Well worth it
review: We stayed there between the 1st to the 8th of August in room 7103. We was directly above the hollywood bar and u could hear it for a little while but it soon went quite. We went with a party off seven 13 year old 11 year old and a 4 year old and they all loved it. We spent most of the days around the pool area and we met sone lovely people who we will be keeping in tonch with . The entertainer Danny was the best entertainer we have ever met he was great with the kids and the adults to the old day we went out was on is day off. The night entertainment was fantastic once again Danny was brilliant doing the kids disco the acts that tropical gardens had was the best too. The only down side was for this hotel is that the air conditioning would be a bit better but we will defo go back…

title: Not for us - in diar need of a major renovation!
review: Our experience of this hotel is the same as the last review-same time and we could have been been neighbours!!  Our room allocation was 7101 and directly over the Hollywood bar. We took ear plugs in preparation and as a result of the reviews we saw before leaving and in case we ended up in block 7 - and of course we did! The music was on until 1:30am on our first night so i asked to be moved.  I was told that we couldn't move because the hotel was fully booked and that the police would be called if the Hollywood bar continued after 12:00 in the evenings thereafter.  To be honest, we also stayed around the pool area until midnight so were not directly effected for too long into the night but it isn't pleasant. The rooms are very basic, a little 'unkempt'-you have a wardrobe with…

title: Lovely hotel but block 7 !!!!
review: After reading some of the reviews I decided to email hotel and ask if we could stay in another block but not block 7 !!!! On arrival we were greated by a lovely girl in reception, who then preceded to give us our rooom key and directions. I looked at room number 7102. I looked at her and said is this block 7. Yes came her reply but dont worry Hollywood bar has been warned and the police will close them down and there is no other rooms. Any problems come back. So off we trotted and low and behold, we were not just in block 7, we were directly above the Hollywood bar. I didnt know whether to laugh or cry as we had also arrived in torrential rain :(.   Anyway the apartment was fair size and bathroom was quite decent. (you pay for what you get its not 5 star) We brought a  travel…

title: Thought it was a great holiday, will go back
review: Hi Had to write as I can't see why there are so many complaints regarding this hotel/complex. We stayed at these apartments last September and wasn't expecting much after reading some reviews....We had a great time, the apartment block we were in was down the road away from the main entertainment bit, so the noise wasn't a problem and anyway, it finished bang on midnight so I don't know why there are so many complaints about the noise.  The entertainment and Tonys crew were fantastic, such a laugh, best we've seen for a long time.  Staff were great.   Apartment was roomy and the balcony HUGE, fed the chickens most mornings while having breakfast.  My only complaint would be that the room hadn't a kettle.....but can honestly say we'll be going back...

title: FAB!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
review: First visited these apartments 19 years ago when i was a nipper best holiday i can remember which made me want to take my family. Although times have moved on the hotel being took over and several changes etc.. i still love it!!!! We have been staying here for the past few years now and we visit about 2 times a year.  The apartments are very basic but clean (one bedroom apartments are miles better than the studios they are quite roomy)  Nothing is too much trouble for the staff they will help you as much as they can to make your stay comfortable (the manager is lovely). Cant say i have any complaints from the noise as cala dor turns into a ghost town after 12pm!!! Yeah you might hear them cleaning up at closing time but it has to be done. The pool area, entertainment and bar is…

title: Don't book a studio and don't book if you like your sleep
review: The reviews we'd read said all apartments were pretty basic, as this is all we usually go for we booked  a studio apartment with no hesitation. What we didn't realise was that a studio apartment doesn't include a proper bed. There were just 2 wooden not even proper sofa beds in the room, there were no fresh covers for these, you have to turn them over and the covers are there, the itchiest thing I've ever slept in! Also the apartment was ridiculosuly tiny (you could practically stand in the middle, arms wide and touch either wall), the bathroom was so small to sit on the toilet properly you had to put your feet in the bath. There was also an archaic air conditioning system. After complaining we managed to upgrade to a 1 bed apartment on the 3rd day, though we had to pay extra.…

title: Good budget hotel. Clean, good location but noisy.
review: I wont write a lot as my stay was a year ago so just trying to do my bit to give back to the forum. Overall, this was a good stay. Its in a good location in Cala Dor, walking distance to everything. The room was absolutely fine for the 4 of us but as other people say, its pretty noisy. I wouldnt recommend for light sleepers or tee totallers! Our 5 and 9 year old had a great time and slept fine on the settees/camp bed. They enjoyed the mini disco in the night and the odd bits of entertainment throughout the day.  Overall, its true that you get what you pay for, dont expect 4* quality here, its a good 2* I would say.

title: The DEFINITVE review - basic, clean but noisy
review: A three-star review for a rightly two-star property  The Good - Great Location - Staff Friendly enough - Kids activities good (Danny the entertainment co-ordinator is the hardest working man in Majorca - Alan Sugar should give him a job!) - Rooms clean and reasonably maintained for standard of property  The Average - Rooms very very basically equpped. Toasters, Microwaves, TV, Iron and Hairdryers are all very expensive extras (e.g. Toaster is 15 euro to hire for the week) - TV is 14 euro a week but only supplies 2 german, 2 spanish and 2 news channels (BBC and CNN)  The Bad - Air Conditioning vitually none existent. Reception claim it operates from 4.00 pm to midnight but no-one we spoke to could find any evidence of it operating at all. - NOISE. Terrible, terrible noise. In…

title: Ignore reviews I LOVED IT!!
review: I loved this hotel so much! Great central location amazing entertainment, shops are fantastic and the night life is brill for everyone! I can't speak more well of this hotel.  Bit noisy but just bring some ear plugs like me, i heard nothing after 12! you're on your hols you have to expect some noise!! Great for families try the little ice cream bar down the side of the hotel where the shops start! Its amazing!
